programme.title: Martial Arts History Museum-Cynthia Rothrock
programme.desc: Officially named, “Queen of the Martial Arts,” Cynthia Rothrock is considered one of the most historic figures in martial arts history. or five consecutive years, she was the undefeated World Champion in the karate tournament circuit. She has graced the cover of over 60 martial arts magazines and was inducted into the prestigious Martial Arts History Museum’s Hall of Fame at its inception in 1999. In the 1980s, she became one of the biggest box office draws in both Hong Kong and America for her action films. To date, she has starred in over 60 films and was also named “Queen of the Martial Arts in Films”. She continues to be one of the greatest advocates for the martial arts conducting countless seminars throughout the world.

programme.title: Martial Arts History Museum-Gerald Okamura
programme.desc: Officially called the "scariest man alive" by Black Belt magazine, we go behind the scenes of one of the most awesome Asian bad guys, Gerald Okamura. From his iconic role at the Hatchett Man in "Big Trouble in Little China," to his many appearances as an evil bad dude, we explore Gerald Okamura's history, his life and his legendary career as one of the top weapons experts in America. Gerald Okamura was inducted into the Martial Arts History Museum's Hall of Fame in 2003. Directed by William Ford with Director of Photography Jim Towns.

programme.desc: Rauan works at a parking lot in a prestigious residential area. Aidar passes him daily in his luxurious car. The auto belongs to his father, who works in the oil business. Rauan and Aidar are both determined to build their own lives themselves. They live

programme.title: The Boat
programme.desc: Buster and his family go on a voyage on his homemade boat that proves to be one disaster after another.

programme.title: Banjo Farid
programme.desc: Farid, 12 years old, is an enigma to others. Quiet and original, he seems to be experiencing daily life without feeling any emotion. However, one day, against all expectations, he will change thanks to an improbable musical instrument.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Valery Liashkevich is now considered an important Belarus artist - but just one year ago, he was living in the railway station and for over twenty years has painted pictures in the streets of the town of Gomel. For the natives he is no more than a local a

programme.title: A Bucket Of Blood
programme.desc: A dim-witted busboy finds acclaim as an artist for a plaster-covered dead cat that is mistaken as a skillful statuette. The desire for more praise soon leads to an increasingly deadly series of works.

programme.title: Horse Tales
programme.desc: Horse Tales tells the story of stable boys, adolescents making a living by taking care of horses. In order to do so, it focuses on their job and their relationships with the animals they care for.

programme.title: Raindrop
programme.desc: This is a story of a young woman and her coming of age in Japan.

programme.title: Dressed To Kill
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes sets out to discover why a trio of murderous villains, including a dangerously attractive female, are desperate to obtain three unassuming and inexpensive little music boxes.

programme.title: Kingston Avenue
programme.desc: Vincent has followed the woman he loves to New York. But they're not getting along anymore. Stubborn, he's going to try to do everything to get her back.

programme.title: Stuck
programme.desc: A light and humorous exploration of one couple's marital problems.

programme.title: Suddenly
programme.desc: In the city of Suddenly, three gangsters trap the Benson family in their own house, on the top of a hill nearby the railroad station, with the intention of killing the president of the USA.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A Foundation reporter, Isidor Dukas comes to the Institute to make a report. For the purpose of objective reporting, the Foundation uses agents with induced, synthetic identities. In confrontation with one of the test subjects, what was supposed to be a r

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: A paparazzi photo sparks a court case as a tabloid magazine spins a scandalous yarn over a painter and a famous singer.

programme.title: The Carters Family Reunion
programme.desc: Erica Carter is looking forward to a relaxing Family Reunion on the 4th of July, when she discovers that the hosts of the event (her parents) are stuck out of town. It's up to Erica and her crazy aunt and uncle to step up and save the day.

programme.title: Music & Murder
programme.desc: Not every rags to riches story arrives via a clean cut straight and narrow path. Sometimes long after the rags have been replaced with Versace, the stench from the counterfeit mindset lingers longer than a starlet would like.

programme.title: Prodigal Husband
programme.desc: Ex-NFL player Kedar Ellis is depressed about his future after a career ending injury. His loyal wife Lydia encourages him to find another way to make a living. Unbeknownst to him he is tempted, loses faith and leaves. Left alone to run the household, Lydi

programme.title: Dark Seed

programme.title: Stolen Lilies
programme.desc: Sandra Dennis, a social worker, whose daughter was a victim of human trafficking must race against the clock to find four girls trapped in a warehouse before they are shipped out of the country.

programme.title: Valentine's Date
programme.desc: A couple desperate to get divorced must survive the craziest weekend of their lives to gain their freedom from each other.

programme.title: Lil Ceasar
programme.desc: Timothy Gibbs was born and raised in Chicago. in the early 70's his father was once the ruler of Harlem N.Y. and while making moves in Chicago, he met Timothy's mom. Growing up on Chicago's southside, Timothy had a rough upbringing, his mother was not the

programme.title: I Used to Love Her

programme.title: Maverick Black Cinema

programme.desc: An elite team of detectives assigned to capture the city's most violent felons gets unwanted help from a stranger that is apprehending them first. Now they have the felons and this stranger to catch, that takes them on the chase of civil arrests to murder

programme.title: Time
programme.desc: Time is a film about two local contract killers that turn their business into a bigger playing field by linking up with the crooked mayor of the city to do one last hit. One man wants out of the game the other says there is no way out.

programme.title: Clockin' Green
programme.desc: Two women embark on a bank heist. Then one double-crosses the other. Revenge minded shenanigans ensue.

programme.title: Hurricane in the Rose Garden
programme.desc: When a difference in culture leaves his Nigerian family and his headstrong bride at odds Joseph is left to smooth things over. But now an unexpected visit by his mother leaves everything in complete disarray. Will her demand for a grand child be the last

programme.title: Humanity's End
programme.desc: In the future humans will become extinct and hybrid races will begin to take over the universe. The year is 2820: An ancient race of aliens, known as the Nephilim, have systematically hunted down and destroyed every human in the galaxy. A semi-retired sta

programme.title: Greed: Heavy Is the Hand
programme.desc: A team of professional hitmen take on a job that gets them caught between political agendas, cops, and a dangerous arms dealer. Alex and Reaper lead a team of highly trained hitmen who have seemingly quiet lives and full time careers. The balance between

programme.title: Stolen Virginity
programme.desc: Life is all about give and take. At some point, we all have to choose a side. Travis was working his dream job, but his boss was a nightmare. When his back was against the wall, he chose to be a "Taker". This time he went too far... he stole a woman's mos

programme.title: Traces of Indignity
programme.desc: Dr. Augusta Weber has traveled the world over promoting her books, DVD's and selling out public speaking events. She is a retired College Professor who is greatly admired by all. Although Dr. Weber is an advocate for being straight-forward, open and hones

programme.title: Secure the Bag
programme.desc: A young man named Lit loves money more than his life, friends and GOD! He is put to the test when he finds some money that came from a robbery. The ones that stole the money are in jail. Lit doesn't know they sent their friends to find the cash. How far w

programme.title: Let's Shake On It
programme.desc: A simple dinner date turns into a fun loving challenge when Brian(Jarrett Glover) insists he can prepare a better meal then what he was served at a restaurant. His girlfriend Trina(Tia Pratcher) is sure he'll fail especially since he has a reputation for

programme.title: Just A Measure of Faith
programme.desc: Husband Jacob handles all the challenges alone, refusing to allow God to help. His wife, Kayla, a strong believer tries to help overcome both of their problems and lead him in the direction of Faith. With their close knit community along with family, frie

programme.title: Jump In
programme.desc: Troy Alexander returns to her roots, armed with a plan, to pass the bar and start her own practice. Although, her love of the law takes a back seat to her young son,Jordan, it provides an escape from realities. Troy is convinced she doesn't need love. She

programme.title: Bound To The Body
programme.desc: This movie is based on a story about different things happening in each person's life. Charlie's life isn't going good because his fiance Kesha is cheating on him with his best friend. Debra is so caught up in her celebrity career that she can't focus on

programme.title: Boss Lady
programme.desc: Raised on the streets of Detroit, Roxanne beat the odds and rose to the top of the male dominated music industry. Now forced to confront the people she stepped on in her rise to fame, Roxanne must face the error of her ways and change before it's too late

programme.title: Basketball 3:16
programme.desc: Sometimes there comes a point in your life where you need to grow up, but only you know when that time comes. That time always comes in one shot and sometimes it's your last shot. The Lord can be found in many places; a Church, a book or even a basketball

programme.title: Anatomy of Love
programme.desc: Cassious is a hopelessly romantic college student seeking to find love and companionship with his best friend Jenesis. However, Jenesis is an emotionally scarred college girl who has outspokenly lost her faith in true love. Coincidently, she is now challe

programme.title: Endless Summer
programme.desc: Keith has spent his whole life dreaming about Alicia. On his last day in town he tries desperately to be noticed by her, but his plans get foiled by his embarrassing grandmother, bullying sister, demanding father, and Alicia's 'player' boyfriend.

programme.title: Nothing Without God
programme.desc: This story is a true tale of a young man accepted to college and struggling to achieve against heavy odds. Because of a drug addicted mother and absentee father, he is adopted by an abusive foster family and then bounces around from family to family. He's

programme.title: Deceitful Storm
programme.desc: This powerful drama about love, pain, deceit and betrayal reveals what can happen when people stop believing in God and take matters into their own hands. A dramatic twist and turn of events through abuse, neglect and infidelity lead to an explosive concl

programme.title: On The Court
programme.desc: Jordan, a mysterious figure who plays basketball by himself at night, decides to join a men's basketball league thanks to the encouragement of his new friend Kevin. Together with their new team of unskilled misfits, The Oranges, they embark in a city-wide

programme.title: Till Death...Do Us Part
programme.desc: Aaron Corbin, a successful businessman, finds himself enjoying life and his new bride Kelly. Married life suits Aaron and his company has hit it big, but with new found success comes bigger problems. His life begins to fall apart and to save it means regr

programme.title: Church Folks
programme.desc: Church Folks tells the story of Frank Hart. A local pastor struggling to keep his ministry alive. With dwindling attendance and the possibility of their lender foreclosing on their church building, Pastor Frank has to rally his team members to keep the do

programme.title: Pastor Jones
programme.desc: Regina is in an abusive marriage and her best friend is sleeping with her husband (Tyron Carlson). After attending Pastor Jones' sermon and speaking with him, she gets the courage to put her faith in God and leave home. With no place to live and no job, P

programme.title: Sweet Justice
programme.desc: Four women run a private child support clinic by day but are collectors at night. Seeking out deadbeat parents and using seduction and force to make them pay up.

programme.title: Lock & Key
programme.desc: Det. Axel 'Axe' Lock and GBI Agent Lucas 'Luke' Key go undercover to track down the distributor of the new drug, 'God's Eye' and the mysterious Saul aka The Son of God. With their identities unknown to one another they work the case from different angles

programme.title: Lock & Key 2: The Fallout
programme.desc: Picking up after the events of the first film, Lock and Key press forward as their paths come dangerously close to crossing like never before. New revelations will come to light, just as a new, 'King' emerges and the fallout could cost them their lives.

programme.title: Maverick Black Cinema
programme.desc: Maverick is the leading indie distributor of Urban and Black Cinema.

programme.title: Kaylah
programme.desc: Two worlds collide when a mama's boy prepares for marriage, but cannot shake his mother's grasp.

programme.title: Magic
programme.desc: The story of a young man growing up in Englewood Chicago through poverty, violence, and adversity. Only to climb up and out of it all to become a success in film and music.

programme.title: Treacherous
programme.desc: Two women's friendship is put to the test when they fall for the same man. Each one harbors secrets that diminish the strength of their relationship with one another. Are these women willing to sacrifice their friendship to follow their 'treacherous' hear

programme.title: No Weapon Shall Prosper
programme.desc: Diana lives her life trying to appease her husband's abusive outrages. She finds comfort and guidance in the arms of another man. When her husband discovers Diana's extramarital affair, he threatens everyone she cares about. Lost and with no direction to

programme.title: A Hard Lesson
programme.desc: A Jewish parole officer, Jeff Solomon White, struggles in his new role as a reading teacher for illiterate teens at a New York high school. Raised by African American parents, White sees the situation differently and is motivated to fight for his students

programme.title: Jackson Bolt
programme.desc: In this tale of revenge and redemption, Jackson Bolt is an emotionally distraught detective who is being treated by the department psychologist. To make matters worse, Jackson's wife Darla is having an affair with his partner. When his partner gets murder

programme.title: Entangled
programme.desc: Meet Danielle,a young,vibrant African American woman. She has a vision of having her own business, home, two children, and a loving husband. No one who knew her dream could turn into a horrible nightmare. Now Meet Demetrius. He seems to be the perfect man

programme.title: Misbehaving Husbands
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when devoted husband Henry Butler becomes the focus of rumors after falling on top of a blonde mannequin.

programme.title: The Spider Strikes
programme.desc: In this serial, a criminal called "The Spider" puts Dick Tracy's brother under a hypnotic trance and turns him against the famous detective.

programme.title: The Bridge of Terror
programme.desc: In this serial, a criminal called "The Spider" puts Dick Tracy's brother under a hypnotic trance and turns him against the famous detective.

programme.title: The Fur Pirates
programme.desc: In this serial, a criminal called "The Spider" puts Dick Tracy's brother under a hypnotic trance and turns him against the famous detective.

programme.title: Crash of the Moons
programme.desc: Rocky Jones, Space Ranger was midway through its run as a syndicated television series when three episodes were edited together and released as Crash of the Moons, a feature film where Rocky (Richard Crane) tries to save the inhabitants of a doomed planet. All of your favorite personalities from the show are here, including Scotty Beckett as Rocky's co-pilot Winky, Sally Mansfield as Rocky's translator and navigator Vena Ray, and Patsy Parsons as Rocky's arch rival, the ever dangerous Queen Cleolanta.

programme.title: Gasoline Alley
programme.desc: The popular Frank O. King comic strip characters go from newspaper page to screen in this 1951 feature film from legendary comedy director Edward Bernds (of Three Stooges and Bowery Boys fame). Scotty Beckett and Jimmy Lydon are Corky and Skeezix, half-brothers who find themselves in the restaurant business until complications and some family conflicts arise.

programme.title: The Man Who Cheated Himself (1950)
programme.desc: A homicide detective witnesses his socialite girlfriend kill her fortune-hunting husband, than watches his inexperienced brother take on the case. Revered director Felix E. Feist (The Devil Thumbs a Ride, Donovan’s Brain) gets the best of a stellar cast that includes two time Oscar nominee Lee J. Cobb (12 Angry Men, The Exorcist) Jane Wyatt (Lost Horizon, Gentleman’s Agreement) and John Dall (Gun Crazy, Rope).

programme.title: Mission to Glory
programme.desc: A biographical account of the legendary Father Eusebio Francisco Kino, a Jesuit missionary and explorer who helped the lives of Native Americans during the 1600s. The movie follows Father Kino (Richard Egan) as he faces many challenges throughout California, Arizona, and Mexico. The stellar cast includes Victor Jory, Aldo Ray, Rory Calhoun, Keenan Wynn, Cesar Romero, John Ireland, and Ricardo Montalban!

programme.title: Some of Manie's Friends
programme.desc: Hollywood heavyhitters of the 1950s and 1960s come together to offer tribute to recording-company executive Manie Sacks in this 1959 television broadcast. Performers include Sid Caesar, Rosemary Clooney, Nat 'King' Cole, Bob Hope, Dinah Shore, Jack Webb, Betty Grable, and Frank Sinatra.

programme.title: King of the Newsboys (1938)
programme.desc: Lew Ayres is the undisputed king of the newsboys in this stirring melodrama from Republic Pictures. Ayres plays Jerry Flynn, a young man from the slums whose girlfriend leaves him for a rich gangster. Determined to become a success, Flynn pours his energy into a newspaper distribution business that becomes the best in the city, but at what price? Also starring Alison Skipworth, Helen Mack, and Alice White, this movie shows what kind of people grow out of the squalor of the tenements.

programme.title: Three Broadway Girls (1932)
programme.desc: This trio of women works hard to stay in the lap of luxury. But although their sugar daddies have the money to keep them happy, the guys are being driven crazy. Director Lowell Sherman’s (Bachelor Apartment, She Done Him Wrong) whip smart film is a comic blast from the past, with Joan Blondell leading the way as the wisecracking Schatzi Sutro. The fun comes from watching these working girls work over their men, proving that money hungry women have provided laughs since the earliest days of movie making!

programme.title: Dreaming Out Loud (1940)
programme.desc: Meet the two hilarious wizards! In Dreaming Out Loud, beloved radio characters Lum (Chester Lauck) and Abner (Norris Goff) make the leap to the silver screen. Helmed by The Scartlet Pimpernel director Harold Young, this slapstick comedy finds our wildly popular characters engaged in a typical series of misadventures while employed at the Jot ‘Em Down, a general store in the heart of a small Arkansas town. A grieving drunk, a lovelorn postmistress, and a cash-strapped young doctor all drift in and out of the lives of our bumbling protagonists, who work to resolve their fellow townsfolk’s woe, albeit with varying success.

programme.title: Graverobbers
programme.desc: A waitress weds a mysterious funeral director.

programme.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
programme.desc: Robert Louis Stevenson’s classic tale gets an early treatment here with John Barrymore as the kindly doctor who believes everyone has a duel nature. The transformation scene, where Jekyll turns into the twisted Mr. Hyde, is as transfixing now as it was nearly a century ago! The cast includes Martha Mansfield as the woman loved by Jekyll, and Nita Naldi as the dance hall girl seduced by Jekyll’s evil alter ego.

programme.title: Carnival of Souls (1962)
programme.desc: "Carnival of Souls" is the story of a young woman who goes along for the ride when two hot-rodders hold a drag race and are forced off a bridge, plunging into the flooded river below. The sole survivor of the accident, Mary, accepts a job in a new town as a church organist where she is repeatedly troubled by visions of a nearby abandoned carnival and a smiling white-faced man with dark rimmed eyes. One of the most atmospherically eerie works of American horror cinema, the film garnered a significant cult following years after being released in 1962, and is essential for every horror collection.

programme.title: Dark Night of the Scarecrow
programme.desc: When gentle but mentally challenged Bubba Ritter's young friend Marylee is mauled by a vicious dog, Bubba becomes the town scapegoat. Disguised as a scarecrow to hide from the angry townspeople, Bubba is found out and tragically murdered. But little do his attackers know that justice for Bubba will come from beyond the grave!

programme.title: One Body Too Many
programme.desc: This murder mystery will give you as many chuckles as chills! Horror icon Bela Lugosi stars along with Jack Haley (The Wizard of Oz) and Jean Parker (Little Women) in a tale of missing bodies, insurance schemes, and creepy mansions. It’s all presented by director Frank McDonald (Bulldog Drummond Strikes Back).

programme.title: The Disappearance of Flight 412
programme.desc: There's so much mystery surrounding the disappearance of Flight 412. And why so much secrecy from the military? Did it, as some suspect, have something to do with flying saucers? An all-star cast headlines this weird drama, including Glenn Ford, Bradford Dilllman, and David Soul. Emmy winning director Jud Taylor was known for his TV production of The Old Man and The Sea, and several episodes of Law & Order: Special Victims Unit.

programme.title: Shoe (1956)
programme.desc: Here he is: the one, the only… GROUCHO! Legendary comedian, Groucho Marx, hosts this laugh-a-minute quiz show, where three couples face off, answering questions of varying difficulty. This game show is sure to make you laugh as contestants struggle to keep up with Marx’s lightning-quick wit and goofy antics.

programme.title: The Big Deal
programme.desc: Friday and Smith attempt to solve a series of car thefts but are getting nowhere until they learn that the car thieves are selling the stolen cars illegally.

programme.title: Night of April 14th (1959)
programme.desc: After having a terrifying dream in which she was drowning in the ocean, a woman is stunned when her fiancée plans a honeymoon for them - a trip to New York on the Titanic.

programme.title: Two Strings of Pearls (1958)
programme.desc: While on a trip to Rome, Mike meets a woman who is using a different name than the name she used when the two first met four years earlier. With his suspicions raised, Mike investigates the woman after discovering she is connected to a notorious American con artist who has a pair of expensive pearls on his mind.

programme.title: The Trail Gang
programme.desc: Ben unknowingly hires outlaw Johnny Logan to help him with his cattle drive. Logan, going by the name Sam Jackson, joined with a plan to kill the sheriff of a nearby town.

programme.title: Jed Throws a Wing Ding
programme.desc: Flatt, Scruggs, and their wives come to visit their old sweetheart, but Pearl thinks they're there to propose.

programme.title: The Case of the Night Train Riddle
programme.desc: A young boy and his father have a fight aboard a train together, resulting in the boy running out of the compartment and seemingly vanishing into thin air. Although his governess thinks he simply ran away, Holmes begins to suspect something a bit more serious.

programme.title: The Wild Intruder
programme.desc: Medic follows Dr. Konrad Styner and his team of Surgeons as they tackle medical cases inside Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Maxey Gorman Story
programme.desc: New York City police officer Barney Ruditsky faces off against organized crime during the Roaring 20s.

programme.title: 's Surprise Party
programme.desc: Celia coordinates a surprise party for Stanley's birthday celebration.

programme.title: Jim, the Farmer
programme.desc: Sick of the hustle and bustle of his job, Jim decides he wants to start a new life on a farm.

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town (1938)
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. It's all about the villainous Bat Haines ("Little Billy" Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many "Worst of all time" lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: A Star is Born
programme.desc: A young woman comes to Hollywood with dreams of stardom, but achieves them only with the help of an alcoholic whose best days are behind him.

programme.title: Mystery of the Hooded Horseman (1937)
programme.desc: The legendary Tex Ritter takes on a gang of hooded bandits in this cow punching classic from the golden era of the singing cowboy. When he’s not infiltrating the gang, Tex is singing such tunes as ‘Ride, Ride, Ride’, ‘I’m a Texas Cowboy’, and the traditional favorite, ‘Ride Around Little Dogies’. So come along with Tex and his trusty horse, White Flash, as they ride to justice and romance in this blazing action thriller!

programme.title: Niagara Falls (1941)
programme.desc: Margie Blake (Margorie Woodworth) is a young woman who wants to get married and have children. Dozens of them! Tom Brown (Tom Wilson) is the non-committal type. When he stops to help her with a flat tire, the comedy begins. Gordon Douglas (In Like Flint, Robin and the 7 Hoods) mines comic gold from a stellar cast, including Slim Summerville and Zasu Pitts as Sam and Emmy Sawyer, bumbling hotel managers who mistakenly believe Margie and Tom have already tied the marital knot!

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid, along with Pancho, try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: His Girl Friday (1940)
programme.desc: In this whip-smart screwball comedy from revered director Howard Hawks, Cary Grant plays a desperate newspaper editor trying to keep his ace-reporter (and ex-wife) from leaving the job to marry someone else. Adapted from Ben Hecht and Charles MacArthur's Broadway smash "The Front Page," the film features such stars as Ralph Bellamy, Gene Lockhart, and Rosalind Russell in a role originally written for a male.

programme.title: Autobiography of a Jeep
programme.desc: Short documentary from the perspective of a Jeep which covers the production process and uses in war times.

programme.title: Last Woman on Earth
programme.desc: When a woman and her husband resurface from a scuba dive in Puerto Rico, they conclude that an interruption of oxygen has killed off the rest of the human race.

programme.title: Last Man on Earth
programme.desc: Vincent Price plays a doctor who must try to single-handedly save the earth when a plague causes the rest of the human race to turn into Vampire Zombies.

programme.title: Carol Burnett Show - Season 1 Episode 30
programme.desc: Carol Burnett leads in a series of comedic sketches including one where she plays a housewife driven mad by TV commercials, and another where she opposites Harvey Korman in a skit about a 90-year-old couple.

programme.title: Season 17 Episode 175
programme.desc: Comedian Johnny Carson hosts a variety of celebrities in his iconic late night talk show.

programme.title: The Ape
programme.desc: Kindly Dr. Adrian (Boris Karloff) is on the verge of creating a polio serum. Unfortunately, in order to complete his experiment he needs spinal fluid from a recently deceased human. All seems hopeless, but when a wild ape escapes from a nearby circus, Dr. Adrian's research takes on a ghastly new dimension. Director William Nigh (Black Dragons, Desert Nights) helmed this Poverty Row thriller from a screenplay co­written by Hollywood legend Curt Siodmak (The Wolfman, I Walked With A Zombie). Who will you root for – the jungle beast, or the man of science?

programme.title: Chandu on the Magic Island
programme.desc: A cult practices human sacrifices to resurrect the spirit of an ancient goddess in this installment of the Chandu series. Bela Lugosi stars, along with Maria Alba as Princess Nadji. The movie was culled from a 12-part serial, The Return of Chandu.

programme.title: Track of the Moon Beast
programme.desc: Paul Carlson has a horrible problem. A fragment from a meteorite has lodged in his skull; when the moon is full the fragment causes him to transform into a murderous beast. Screenwriters Bill Finger (best known for his work on the Batman comic book) and Charles Sinclair (The Green Slime) conjure a tale that includes everything from Native American legends to NASA brain surgeons.

programme.title: She Gods of Shark Reef
programme.desc: Two brothers, including one wanted for murder, are shipwrecked on an island inhabited by beautiful woman who possess a cache of valuable pearls. What the brothers don't know is that the island women worship a shark god, and are known to make human sacrifices! With a cast that includes the smoldering Lisa Montell, this intense adventure was directed by drive-in movie king Roger Corman. For movie buffs: Corman made the most of location shooting, filming Shark Reef in the same Hawaiian setting as Naked Paradise (1957).

programme.title: The Amazing Transparent Man
programme.desc: What you can't see will kill you! Cult director Edgar G. Ulmer (The Man From Planet X; Detour) was behind this curiosity about Dr. Peter Uloff (Ivan Triesault), a crazed scientist who plans to create an army of invisible zombies. Uloff experiments with convicted safe-cracker Joey Faust (Douglas Kennedy), only to be shocked by some unexpected side effects!

programme.title: Grass (1959)
programme.desc: Here he is: the one, the only… GROUCHO! Legendary comedian, Groucho Marx, hosts this laugh-a-minute quiz show, where three couples face off, answering questions of varying difficulty. This game show is sure to make you laugh as contestants struggle to keep up with Marx’s lightning-quick wit and goofy antics.

programme.title: Big Betty (1953)
programme.desc: A gang of con artists checks the obituary section of the daily newspaper, then uses the information they gather to prey on the grief-stricken families of those who have recently died.

programme.title: The Dead Part of the House (1959)
programme.desc: After moving into a new house with her father and aunt, a young girl befriends a trio of ghosts residing in an upstairs nursery.

programme.title: Lady on the Loose (1959)
programme.desc: A European millionaire’s sheltered daughter feels stifled by her chaperones, so she asks Mike for help in escaping them so she can go into the town.

programme.title: Blood on the Land
programme.desc: Adam finds himself hostage to Jeb, a dangerous sheep herder who wants Ben to sign over a large plot of land.

programme.title: Jed Plays Solomon
programme.desc: Granny can't stand Pearl's yodeling so she reports her to the police.

programme.title: The Case of the Baker Street Nursemaids (1955)
programme.desc: After finding a baby on their doorstop, Holmes and Watson discover the child is the son of a missing French scientist. When Watson is later attacked and the baby kidnapped, Holmes and Watson must find both baby and father.

programme.title: Red Christmas
programme.desc: Medic follows Dr. Konrad Styner and his team of Surgeons as they tackle medical cases inside Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Muddy Kasoff Story
programme.desc: New York City police officer Barney Ruditsky faces off against organized crime during the Roaring 20s.

programme.title: The Break Up
programme.desc: Stanley and Celia come to blows over matters of pride.

programme.title: Father of the Year
programme.desc: When the town hosts a "Father of the Year" contest, the kids want to nominate Jim, but just can't think of what to write.

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock (1940)
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this action­packed feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogers’s ongoing sidekick George “Gabby” Hayes, this two­fisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including "Up and Down the Prairie," and "When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies."

programme.title: Cheyenne Rides Again (1937)
programme.desc: Get ready for thundering thrills! A lawman (Tom Tyler) pretends to be an outlaw, steals $10,000 from a cattle thief, then promises to return the money if he can join the gang. Meanwhile, his real mission is to expose the bad guys! Lon Chaney Jr. stars appears in one of his early roles for director Robert F. Hill (Shadow of Chinatown, Flash Gordon).

programme.title: Jack London (1943)
programme.desc: Michael O’Shea stars as one of America’s great authors, Jack London. With a screenplay inspired by a memoir by London’s second wife Charmion, director Alfred Santell takes us on a tour of London’s early life, highlighted by London’s coverage of the Russo­Japanese War in 1904. Also starring Susan Hayward, Virginia Mayo, Ralph Morgan, and Regis Toomey, this biopic from Samuel Bronston Productions (King of Kings, El Cid) is an exciting look at the true adventures of a rugged and remarkable American icon.

programme.title: The Big Chance
programme.desc: The corruption of big time boxing is the subject of this compelling drama. John Darrow plays “Knockout Frankie Morgan”, a young fighter whose career is in the hands of gangsters. Will he play by their crooked rules, or will his new girlfriend make him change his ways? Look for a 12-year-old Mickey Rooney as one of the stars of this long forgotten gem!

programme.title: Idaho
programme.desc: Western icon Roy Rogers, along with his trusty companion Trigger, are back for another adventure. This time, a respected judge is being framed for murder by a crooked saloon owner. Always the valiant champion, Rogers vows to clear the name of the judge and find the truth — all while courting a lovely beau. Cellist turned editor turned Republic Pictures workhorse Joseph Kane takes the reins of this rousing, musical adventure, which features a number of original songs performed by Rogers himself, with the help of singer-songwriter Bob Nolan and character actor Smiley Burnette (TV’s “Petticoat Junction”).

programme.title: Algiers
programme.desc: Charles Boyer and Hedy Lamarr are the ill-fated couple in this Hollywood remake of the French classic Pepe le Moko. Boyer is Pepe, the jewel thief hiding out in Algiers' maze-like and mysterious Casbah. Pepe is a master criminal who rules his field, but when he meets the beautiful Parisian Gaby (Lamarr, in her American film Debut), he begins to question his shady existence. Directed by John Cromwell (Dead Reckoning, The Prisoner of Zenda) with dialog by noir master James M. Cain, Algiers was an influence on everything from Pepe Le Pew cartoons to the making of Casablanca.

programme.title: Cosmo Jones, Crime Smasher
programme.desc: Cosmo Jones (Frank Graham) is a small town man who considers himself a detective after taking a correspondence course. When he visits the nearest big city to offer his services to the police, he stumbles across everything from gang wars to kidnappings. With some great comic personalities in the cast, including Edgar Kennedy and Mantan Moreland, this delightful Monogram comedy was directed by James Tinling (Mr. Moto's Gamble, Charlie Chan in Shanghai) and practically invents the term "Do it yourself detecting!"

programme.title: Gorilla Ship (1932)
programme.desc: Vengeance rides the sea in this Depression era melodrama. This tale of shipwrecks and infidelity stars Ralph Ince as Captain "Gorilla" Larson, plus Vera Reynolds and Reed Howes, with direction by B-movie ace Frank R. Strayer (best known for The Vampire Bat). The multi-plot screenplay is by George Waggner, who would go on to direct such classics as The Wolfman and The Fighting Kentuckian...

programme.title: Lady Frankenstein
programme.desc: When Dr. Frankenstein is killed by his own creation, his daughter and his lab assistant, Marshall, continue his work. Together, they attempt to create a monster even greater than the one that killed Dr. Frankenstein. (Color)

programme.title: Mission Accomplished
programme.desc: Short Documentary on the Flying Fortress Plane.

programme.title: Carol Burnett Show - Season 1 Episode 27
programme.desc: Carol Burnett leads a series of comedic sketches guest starring Peter Lawford and Minnie Pearl.

programme.title: Season 26 Episode 131
programme.desc: Comedian Johnny Carson hosts a variety of celebrities in his iconic late night talk show.

programme.title: You're Ahead, Mr. X
programme.desc: From the uncrowned king of industrial and educational training films, Jam Handy, comes this vintage 1950s short.

programme.title: What's New? Featuring Pat Boone
programme.desc: From the uncrowned king of industrial and educational training films, Jam Handy, comes this vintage 1950s short.

programme.title: The Monster from the Ocean Floor
programme.desc: Julie, an American on vacation in Mexico, spots a giant, one-eyed amoeba rising from the ocean, but when she tries to tell the authorities, no one believes her. She finally teams up with a marine biologist in an attempt to destroy it.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Psycho (1961)
programme.desc: Terrifying! A Psychotic Killer prowls the night! ... Will he be stopped before he kills again? Ronnie Burns (the son of TV favorites George Burns and Gracie Allen!) stars as Chet, a delusional young man boiling with rage after his brother is sentenced to death for murder. As his paranoid feelings increase, Chet decides to create some mayhem of his own, including arson! A cast of unknowns come together for this feature by Boris Petroff, who also directed the cult favorite, The Unearthly. Just sit back and enjoy watching poor Chet lose touch with reality!

programme.title: Night Tide
programme.desc: A young sailor falls in love with a mysterious woman, performing as a mermaid at the local carnival. He soon comes to suspect the girl might be a real mermaid, who draws men to a watery death during the full moon.

programme.title: Mind Over Murder
programme.desc: When a young woman suffers a series of nightmares involving a bald man, a government agent seeks to uncover the truth when a plane crash appears to involve the man in the woman's dreams.

programme.title: Door (1956)
programme.desc: Here he is: the one, the only… GROUCHO! Legendary comedian, Groucho Marx, hosts this laugh-a-minute quiz show, where three couples face off, answering questions of varying difficulty. This game show is sure to make you laugh as contestants struggle to keep up with Marx’s lightning-quick wit and goofy antics.

programme.title: The Big Family
programme.desc: Sgt. Joe Friday and his partners methodically investigate crimes in Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Devil's Laughter (1959)
programme.desc: On death row, John Marriott claims he has seen how he will die - and it will not be on the gallows.

programme.title: Turntable (1958)
programme.desc: When Mike takes pictures of a crooked gambler, a gubernatorial candidate promises to put the gambler out of business if elected. Before anything can be done, however, the pictures have been stolen and used to make a composite that makes the candidate appear to be a member of the gambling syndicate.

programme.title: Badge Without Honor
programme.desc: After a U.S. deputy marshal saves Adam's life from two gunmen, he explains that he is in town to bring a close friend of the Cartwright's to San Francisco to testify in a statewide racketeering trial, but the Deputy Marshal's motives for the witness soon become suspicious.

programme.title: Western
programme.desc: A cowboy and a lawman face a new reality that threatens their way of life along the Texan and Mexican border.

programme.title: The Kill Team
programme.desc: Adam Winfield, a soldier-turned-whistleblower, returns from the battlefield to expose shocking war crimes that the U.S. Army will do anything to cover up. From Emmy and Academy Award-nominated director Dan Krauss, THE KILL TEAM is an intimate look at one

programme.title: The Love Destination Expert Series - Food and Nutrition
programme.desc: Got a craving that you just can't seem to satisfy without reaching for something you know you shouldn't be eating? Perhaps your body is trying to tell you something as Freedomology Coach Nardia Norman explains in this episode of The Love Destination Expert Series.

programme.title: Body Love - The Importance Of Loving Your Body
programme.desc: On a scale of one to ten, how much do you love your body? A big part of loving ourselves, is accepting our body the way is now not when you’ve hit your ideal weight. So if you answered less than five and you really don’t like your body at all, it’s time for a big dose of self-love as Freedom Entrepreneur and Health Expert Nardia Norman explains in this episode of The Love Destination Expert Series.

programme.title: The Love Destination Expert Series - Food and Nutrition

When they’re out of whack so are we. But you can manipulate and balance them naturally as Freedom Entrepreneur and Health Expert Nardia Norman reveals in this episode of The Love Destination Expert Series.

programme.title: Christa McAuliffe: Reach For The Stars
programme.desc: An intimate portrait of Christa McAuliffe, NASA's Teacher in Space on board Space Shuttle Challenger. Reach for the Stars is HER story and the impact she made on the world, her family, and the legacy of her own words..." I Touch the Future, I Teach."

programme.title: Greetings From Fire Island
programme.desc: Greetings from Fire Island is a documentary that captures the natural beauty and history of a long wisp of land off the coast of Long Island’s south shore.

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S1 E7 | Reality show star Murray Swanby stops by The Q Agenda! He gives us the scoop behind all the drama that goes into his new show Men of West Hollywood. The Q Agenda also hosts the leadership of the Men's Health Foundation to give tips and help bust the myths about HIV prevention, PreP and other issues regarding health in out LGBTQ community.

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S1 E8 | She knows how to make an entrance! Jessica Wild of RuPaul’s Drag Race fame details her journey from Puerto Rico and encouraging wider public acceptance of drag. We also have fitness expert Luis Suarez with tips on how to get that hot bod, and continue Vogue Magazine's discussion on why Carrie’s relationship with her gay husband in the hit show Sex and the City wouldn’t fly today.

programme.title: Culture Q
programme.desc: S1 E20 | In entertainment, the first Latino wins Best Play at the Tony's for a queer take on Em Forster's Howard's End, while Elvira comes out and Willie Garson passes away. Switzerland votes for marriage equality, as Scotland incorporates LGBTQ+ topics into their curriculum and a Polish province rejects homophobia. The lesbian and queer weekend celebration in Palm Springs turns 30.

programme.title: Putting On
programme.desc: S2 E6 | In the final episode of the season, On’s brand continues to evolve as new partnerships are considered. Dave surprises On with a field trip and the couple seriously discuss moving home to New York City.

programme.title: Were You Gay In High School?
programme.desc: Two queer women recall their awkward, closeted high school days of kissing boys and straight-girl crushes.

programme.title: BIFL
programme.desc: Expectations, different shades of intimacy, & what it really means to love someone.

programme.title: Happy Playland
programme.desc: S1 E1-5 | Billie Haare, an anxious actress caught between her passion for stage and her parents’ dreams of the silver screens, starts a new job at a desolate indoor playground, managed by wannabe-insta-star Cris. Billie quickly develops feelings for social justice warrior, Zara, who is sadly 23 and not looking for anything serious. After a passionate moment in the ball pit, Billie and Zara both begin to question what they want. But the playland is soon to be closed - and Billie’s anxiety can only handle so much. Cris decides to intervene. Can Billie woo Zara into forever and always? Will anyone ned up happy? Will Cris’ trip to Queenstown increase her followers? Only time will tell, in the place where dreams come true, Happy Playland, The Wellington branch.

programme.title: For My Wife
programme.desc: A feature documentary chronicling the making of an activist. After the tragic death of her wife, Charlene Strong was thrust into the spotlight becoming a powerful voice ;for the equal rights of same-sex couples and their families.

programme.title: About Face
programme.desc: As the AIDS epidemic in New York escalated during the '80s, a young, out, black producer creates a series of public television programs focused on HIV/AIDS, bringing folks who were previously ignored by mainstream media to the core of the public discussion.

programme.title: Culture Q
programme.desc: S1 E20 | In entertainment, the first Latino wins Best Play at the Tony's for a queer take on Em Forster's Howard's End, while Elvira comes out and Willie Garson passes away. Switzerland votes for marriage equality, as Scotland incorporates LGBTQ+ topics into their curriculum and a Polish province rejects homophobia. The lesbian and queer weekend celebration in Palm Springs turns 30.

programme.title: Barbelle
programme.desc: S1 E1-3 | Alice and Veronica attempt to tell band manager Karen that they've broken up - as a band and a couple. They quickly learn that breaking up is not an option. Alice and Veronica start work on their second album. Band manager Karen introduces a new collaborator: the former CB3 child star turned pop starlet Lulu St. Claire. Axis Records executive Richard shows up to hear Alice and Veronica's progress on their new album. Alice takes a step forward with Lulu.

programme.title: Barbelle
programme.desc: S1 E4-6 | Alice and Veronica prepare for a live interview. Veronica is shocked by a discovery. Veronica and Alice shoot a music video with an eccentric French Canadian music video director. Alice and Veronica crash Lulu's ultra lame birthday party replete with pop, chips, and weird uncles. Lulu attempts to keep her budding romance with Alice a secret from her religious parents while Veronica gets up to her usual disruptive antics.

programme.title: Barbelle
programme.desc: S1 E7-10 | Alice and Veronica head to the studio to work on the new album. After Karen informs Alice that Lulu will no longer be working on the new album, Alice realizes this might be the end of her and Lulu's relationship. Veronica attempts to win back Alice by writing the perfect song. Her writer's block leads to a downward spiral of shoplifting and booze only hours before she is set to accompany Brooklyn to prom. Alice confronts Veronica about her poor choices. Veronica wakes up to find The Ghost of Girlfriend's Past waiting to take her on a Dickensian journey through her past. Alice accompanies Brooklyn to her prom in Veronica's stead. Lulu shows up to the prom unannounced, as does another surprise guest.↵

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: Sam and Ninny come to the horrifying realization that their lives are in jeopardy, and they must escape this Virginian plantation at once.

programme.title: Ava's Impossible Things
programme.desc: Ava and her mother Claire are bonded by many things...unconditional love, a passion for the arts, a belief that magic exists, and an insidious disease that will one day end both their lives. It's been three years since Ava moved back into her mother's house to care for Claire, and as Ava witnesses the slow downward spiral all she can do is keep her mother's spirits up while locking away the fears of her own future. Today is a day like any other until rare guests and unexpected events compel Claire to make a shocking announcement, sending Ava into a tailspin. Unable to deal with reality, Ava cries herself to sleep in her mother's arms and escapes to a dream world filled with old friends and long forgotten desires.

programme.title: BIFL
programme.desc: Expectations, different shades of intimacy, & what it really means to love someone.

programme.title: Culture Q
programme.desc: S1 E20 | In entertainment, the first Latino wins Best Play at the Tony's for a queer take on Em Forster's Howard's End, while Elvira comes out and Willie Garson passes away. Switzerland votes for marriage equality, as Scotland incorporates LGBTQ+ topics into their curriculum and a Polish province rejects homophobia. The lesbian and queer weekend celebration in Palm Springs turns 30.

programme.title: Her Story
programme.desc: S1 | Her Story is about two trans women in Los Angeles who have given up on love, when chance encounters give them hope. Violet is drawn to Allie, a reporter who approaches her for an interview. Career-driven Paige meets James, the first man she's considered opening up to in years. Will they risk letting what they are stand in the way of being loved for who they are? This is a story of complex characters who laugh, struggle, and grow, who share strength in sisterhood, who seek and find love. Her Story depicts the unique, complicated, and very human women we see in queer communities, and explores how these women navigate the intersections of label identity and love.

programme.title: 1 Million Happy Nows
programme.desc: The story of Lainey and Eva’s changing relationship as they struggle to deal with the diagnosis of Lainey’s Early Onset Alzheimer’s.

programme.title: Denial
programme.desc: DENIAL is a documentary about electricity, identity, family, and about the many ways we lie to ourselves when faced with overwhelming facts. It is the story of a family coming to terms with complex personal truths against the backdrop of a global crisis.

programme.title: Amplify Voices
programme.desc: S1 E4 | A multi-ethnic conversation about the LGBTQ+ experience from thought-leaders in the community across entertainment, beauty, music, activism & politics.

programme.title: Amplify Voices
programme.desc: S1 E8 | This prestigious panel of openly gay US Ambassadors / Presidential Administrators explores the current challenges and opportunities facing the LGBTQ+ community in the U.S. and around the globe, including how Trump’s administration has impacted civil rights, equal rights and LGBTQ+ rights here and abroad.

programme.title: Gown and Out in Beverly Hills
programme.desc: S1 E1 | This week we find Superstar, Renee Taylor popping into the boutique to find the perfect gown for her husband, Joe Bologna's Lifetime Achievement Award during the Academy Awards.

programme.title: Gown and Out in Beverly Hills
programme.desc: S1 E2 | The Brady Bunch Movie and Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas actress, Jennifer Elise Cox and Chinese Academy Award Winner, Movie and TV Star, Bai Ling swing by for a Pol Atteu original custom couture gown.

programme.title: Whatta Lark
programme.desc: Children’s Author Megan Revere is presented with an ultimatum from her publisher: decide whether or not to have a kid, when she unwittingly stumbles upon the drag queen Whatta Lark.

programme.title: Scrum
programme.desc: The lives of a self-assured Canadian jock, a rookie Irish backpacker and a stoic Japanese outsider change when they vie for a position in the grueling Bingham Cup.

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S2 E1 | LGBTQ pride and power take center stage on this episode. We’re talking about finding our strength, and Dante Maurice Marshall and Y. Chere Marshall join us as well to talk intersectionality when it comes to being queer and serving our country. Plus, comedian Nicky Paris from The Zoo joins us for some comic relief.

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S2 E2 | We’re joined by Roman Navarrette of The Blade LA, drag queen Kay Sedia, fellow LATV host Dennis Pastorizo, and our host Victor gives us makeup tips!

programme.title: Amplify Voices
programme.desc: S1 E4 | A multi-ethnic conversation about the LGBTQ+ experience from thought-leaders in the community across entertainment, beauty, music, activism & politics.

programme.title: Amplify Voices
programme.desc: S1 E8 | This prestigious panel of openly gay US Ambassadors / Presidential Administrators explores the current challenges and opportunities facing the LGBTQ+ community in the U.S. and around the globe, including how Trump’s administration has impacted civil rights, equal rights and LGBTQ+ rights here and abroad.

programme.title: Gown and Out in Beverly Hills
programme.desc: S1 E1 | This week we find Superstar, Renee Taylor popping into the boutique to find the perfect gown for her husband, Joe Bologna's Lifetime Achievement Award during the Academy Awards.

programme.title: Gown and Out in Beverly Hills
programme.desc: S1 E2 | The Brady Bunch Movie and Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas actress, Jennifer Elise Cox and Chinese Academy Award Winner, Movie and TV Star, Bai Ling swing by for a Pol Atteu original custom couture gown.

programme.title: Whatta Lark
programme.desc: Children’s Author Megan Revere is presented with an ultimatum from her publisher: decide whether or not to have a kid, when she unwittingly stumbles upon the drag queen Whatta Lark.

programme.title: Scrum
programme.desc: The lives of a self-assured Canadian jock, a rookie Irish backpacker and a stoic Japanese outsider change when they vie for a position in the grueling Bingham Cup.

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S2 E1 | LGBTQ pride and power take center stage on this episode. We’re talking about finding our strength, and Dante Maurice Marshall and Y. Chere Marshall join us as well to talk intersectionality when it comes to being queer and serving our country. Plus, comedian Nicky Paris from The Zoo joins us for some comic relief.

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S2 E2 | We’re joined by Roman Navarrette of The Blade LA, drag queen Kay Sedia, fellow LATV host Dennis Pastorizo, and our host Victor gives us makeup tips!

programme.title: Baby Steps
programme.desc: From Oscar-winning Producer Li-Kong Hsu (Ang Lee’s The Wedding Banquet, Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon, Eat Drink Man Woman) and Stephen Israel (Swimming With Sharks and G.B.F.), comes this multi-cultural comedy-drama, which takes a funny but honest look at gay family issues in complicated dynamo of a cross-generational Taiwanese and American family. Danny, a Taiwanese-American man, longs to have a baby with his American partner Tate, but their attempts at international surrogacy are complicated by Danny’s meddling mother, who wants to control every aspect of the process -- all the way from Taipei.

programme.title: No Gender! The Queer Life Of An Intersex Manga Artist
programme.desc: Up until age 30, Sho Arai lived as a woman, but was found to be intersex after chromosome testing.

programme.title: 1 Million Happy Nows
programme.desc: The story of Lainey and Eva’s changing relationship as they struggle to deal with the diagnosis of Lainey’s Early Onset Alzheimer’s.

programme.title: Words
programme.desc: "Words" explores how people navigate gender & identity in the open & evolving landscape of NYC. Featuring exclusive interviews from a variety of artists, activists, icons & innovators. Powerful tribute to the language we use to shape our identities.

programme.title: Ann
programme.desc: Ann is a feature film narrating the story of Ruben, a visual artist who has decided to abandon his tormented life by taking refuge within his own imagination; creating a world parallel to reality.

programme.title: TransMilitary
programme.desc: The 2018 SXSW Audience Award-winning feature film debut by Gabriel Silverman, Fiona Dawson, & Jamie Coughlin, TransMilitary follows the Emmy-nominated short film Transgender, at War and in Love. Around 15,500 transgender people serve in the U.S. military (notably the largest transgender employer in the U.S.), where they must conceal their gender identity because military policies ban their service. TransMilitary chronicles the lives of four individuals (Senior Airman Logan Ireland, Corporal Laila Villanueva, Captain Jennifer Peace & First Lieutenant El Cook) defending their country’s freedom while fighting for their own. They put their careers and their families’ livelihoods on the line by coming out as transgender to top brass officials in the Pentagon in hopes of attaining the equal right to serve. The ban was lifted in 2016, but with President Trump now trying to reinstate it, their futures hang in the balance once again.

programme.title: Light In The Water
programme.desc: Follow West Hollywood Aquatics' battle for acceptance in the world of competitive sports.

programme.title: Fly Brother
programme.desc: S1 E1 | Ernest visits a chocolatier, samba school, and more with his friends in São Paulo, Brazil.

programme.title: Fly Brother
programme.desc: S1 E2 | Ernest explores food, music, faith, and more with his friends in Tbilisi, Georgia.

programme.title: I'm From Driftwood
programme.desc: Laverne Cox: I'm From Mobile/New Teacher Encounters Homophobia In Second Week/Coming Out Again To Grandma With Alzheimer's/Gender Bending And Runway Walking In A McDonald's Parking Lot/Homeless, Transgender And Finding Her Way/Trans Woman Sacrifices Everything To Finally Be Herself/Transgender High School Student Encounters Cyberbullying/A Broken Down Car, Matching Tattoos, And A Love Story/Agender Person Goes From Being Bullied In The Newark Projects To Gracing The Cover of French Vogue/ Alan Cumming: True Bisexual Stories S1 E1-10 | Laverne Cox remembers the bullying she experienced as a child, and how it's similar to the transphobia she experiences as an adult. Alexa moved from New York City to small-town Jackson, Mississippi, to teach at an under-priveleged school. After only two weeks in, Alexa had to challenge homophobia in the hallway, and had some surprising success. Megan's grandma was supportive and excited when she found out Megan was a lesbian. But after showing signs of Alzheimer's, Megan's grandma forgot and kept asking her if she was seeing any special boy. Megan received a special phone call from her grandma, though, that she'll remember forever. Jacob Tobia, activist for genderqueer, gender non-conforming, and transgender issues, bought a single pair of black pumps while organizing a Gender Nonconforming Day for their high school, a small act that would change the course of their life. After being kicked out of her home at 17, Angela Louis struggled with homelessness, abusive relationships, sex work, and depression, all while transitioning, but nothing could stop her from finding her own path and earning her diploma. Mila Jam had it all, or so she thought. Her drag persona, Britney Houston, had a massive YouTube following and she performed on a hit TV show in London. But she gave it all up so that she could finally live her truth as a woman and as herself. Olivia Page was brave enough to transition in high school. Unfortunately, a classmate decided to cyberbully her on Facebook. Olivia also had the support and kindness of a teacher who helped her through high school. A wild series of events led Sam to meeting the love of her life. Andre J. wants to tell you one thing: Love Yourself. That's how Andre went from being bullied in the projects to appearing on the cover of French Vogue. Alan Cumming remembers when he first felt an attraction to guys and how he came out to American media in a big way. - Externals

programme.title: Equality U
programme.desc: Equality U is a feature-length documentary following 34 young activists on the Soulforce Equality Ride. At some stops they're welcomed with open arms, at others they're arrested for trespassing or for simply attempting to open up a dialog. At every stop, they're connecting with young people who've often never met an openly gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender person who is comfortable with who they are.

programme.title: Unlikely Family
programme.desc: Follow this Unlikely Family as it challenges the archaic ideology that being openly gay - and Christian - is incompatible.

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S2 E3 | Victor, Lianna, and Enrique talk about conversion therapy, inclusion in Hollywood with casting director Yolanda Guillen, and living healthy through meal prepping with personal trainer Luis Suarez.

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S2 E4 | Writer, Producer, and Director Stan Zimmerman (Golden Girls, Gilmore Girls) and actress Raquenel join us to discuss their LatinX retelling of The Diary of Anne Frank. Plus an interview with the first trans person to run for California state office, Ashlee Marie Preston. Also we discuss LGBTQ voter turnout and how it can improve.

programme.desc: S1 E1 | Ernest visits a chocolatier, samba school, and more with his friends in São Paulo, Brazil.

Plus an interview with the first trans person to run for California state office, Ashlee Marie Preston. Also we discuss LGBTQ voter turnout and how it can improve.

programme.title: The Billionaire
programme.desc: A gender-swapped independent film adaptation of George Bernard Shaw's classic play 'The Millionairess', transposed into a contemporary context of Gay Marriage and Asexuality, THE BILLIONAIRE follows a haughty and prudish young billionaire's quest for love, despite all the odds. The film is a throwback to Classic Hollywood films, stylistically and tonally.

programme.title: Still I Strive
programme.desc: The NACA orphanage in Phnom Penh, work to achieve one of the highest honors in Cambodian society, to perform before the Princess Bopha Devi. The children's epic performance is recreated as a cinematic adventure that parallels their harrowing backstories.

programme.title: Chantelle: Psychic P.D. Night Division
programme.desc: In 1984, a bizarre new cop comedy from the UK became an overnight hit. Our "All Access" documentary crew follows the actors and egos behind-the-scenes of "Chantelle: Psychic P.D. - Night Division." From its huge hairdos to cheesy one-liners, cast bust-ups to torrid affairs, no one’s getting out of this looking good. A multi award-winning tongue-in-cheek British comedy with a saucy side, "Chantelle: Psychic P.D." is a mix of "real" cast interviews, behind-the-scenes footage from on-set, and clips from the fictitious cop show.

programme.title: Dropping The Soap
programme.desc: 2017 Emmy Winner, Jane Lynch, Best Actress in Web Series/Comedy. Shit's about to get real for the cast and crew of the long running (awful) soap opera "Collided Lives" when new Executive Producer Olivia Vanderstein arrives to shake things up.

programme.title: Gina Yashere: Laughing To America
programme.desc: Filmed live in San Francisco, CA, UK's premier black female comedian, Gina Yashere, has come to America! Her unique take on being a cultural insider and outsider never fails to raise the roof as she gives us her take on the news gripping the nation.

programme.title: Louis Anderson: Big Baby Boomer
programme.desc: Veteran funny man Louie Anderson returns to the stage in this hilarious one hour stand up comedy special. Louie takes an unconventional and jovial look at his bad habits, pesky family members, and aging body.

programme.title: The Influencers
programme.desc: Six social media influencers compete for an exclusive brand deal with the latest millennial juice craze: Jücytox. As cameras capture each influencer IRL, the manicured versions they present to the world online begin to not just crumble, but implode before our eyes.

programme.title: Magic H8 Ball
programme.desc: Burned by a cheating boyfriend (and some mild chlamydia), a heartbroken pushover turns to a mysterious Magic 8 Ball for the answers. But as he starts giving into his impulses, he risks his hurt turning into hate-and losing all control.

programme.title: Suicide Kale
programme.desc: While having lunch with another couple, new couple Jasmine and Penny stumble upon an anonymous suicide note and proceed to work to uncover the identity of the author.

programme.title: Amplify Voices
programme.desc: S1 E1 | The four most powerful African American women in politics share the story of their friendship and how it has changed politics in America. Join the authors in a discussion about the book and how their careers evolved, while offering advice to Black women who dream of working in the field.

programme.title: Your Time With Thomas
programme.desc: S1 E1-4 | Welcome to the premiere episode of "Your Time With Thomas," where we meet the inimitable Thomas Orlina. In this episode, Thomas shares a personal story of coming out as gay to his family and friends. This episode, Thomas gives his take on what makes an excellent friend and much more! Thomas and his best friend go to the beach and talk about fun topics like social media, dating, dating apps and much more!

programme.title: Your Time With Thomas
programme.desc: S1 E5-8 | In this episode, we visit one of the biggest organizations in Los Angeles, "Project Angel Food." Thomas shares his journey into the entertainment industry, and discusses his top tips on how to really make it. In this episode, join Thomas as he hits up a cool popular spot in Los Angeles called Echo Park. If you're looking for a relaxing day, this is the place for you! This episode, join Thomas as he heads to his favorite city, Las Vegas!

programme.title: Your Time With Thomas
programme.desc: S2 E1-4 | In this episode, we discuss tips for starting a YouTube channel. This episode, we explore healthy habits to improve your life! In this episode, Thomas discusses and explores his fashion must-haves. Thomas gives tips on how to break into the entertainment industry.

programme.title: Jonathan's Kitchen
programme.desc: S1 E6 | Marianne Tshihamba joins me to create a vegan take on one of my favorite side dishes.

programme.title: Jonathan's Kitchen
programme.desc: S1 E7 | Danny Kaylor-Hawkins joins me to prepare a quiet dinner for our husbands.

programme.title: Chance
programme.desc: Trevor's life has become a void, following the passing of his wife and long term companion, Doris. Days run into weeks, as Trevor slowly finds himself isolated and alone, and unconcernedly slipping towards death. A chance encounter in the park with a mysterious stranger equally troubled by his own dark past jarringly reawakens him, and forces both men to once again start to live.

programme.title: My Trans Life
programme.desc: Being trans is a mental, physical and emotional journey and MY TRANS LIFE showcases inspiring trans individuals on their journeys of acceptance. From preparing for major surgery, to tackling love lives, to campaigning for equality, MY TRANS LIFE follows transgender people facing the world in the body they were meant to be in.

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S2 E5 | We're joined by Eric and Jose of the Homo Homies Podcast, founder of Marianella luxury soaps David Foote, and we discuss depression amongst LGBTQ youth.

programme.title: The Q Agenda
programme.desc: S2 E6 | We're joined by LGBTQ activist Queen Victoria Ortega, music sensation Georgel, and we find out if adopting a pet can help strengthen relationships.

programme.title: Akili and Friends in TV Land
Agwe
programme.desc: On a Caribbean island inhabited by the survivors of a slave shipwreck, a young moon priestess must overcome her insecurities, defy tradition and step into her power to save her people from impending danger.

programme.title: Isi & Shola Adventures: Family Dance Time!
programme.desc: Move and Groove with Isi & Shola Featuring Tanzania, Zimbabwe, Senegal and Kenya

programme.title: Isi & Shola Adventures: Isi & Shola Go Up the River Nile!
programme.desc: Isi & Shola Go Up the River Nile!

programme.title: Isi & Shola Adventures: Wheel On The Bus
programme.desc: Join Isi and Shola as they explore different countries in Africa through song and dance!

programme.title: Naija Wives Of Toronto: You Don't Know My Name?
programme.desc: Uche meets the new ladies at the photoshoot and mixes up their names.

programme.title: Naija Wives Of Toronto: That Fateful Dinner
programme.desc: Abby took the ladies to workout with her fiance at the gym and Matilda and Uche get into a heated argument.

programme.title: Naija Wives Of Toronto: Madam Veggie
programme.desc: Matilda invites the ladies to her new apartment for her house warming.

programme.title: Naija Wives Of Toronto: Who is she?
programme.desc: Abby introduces a new person to the ladies and Matilda isnt having it.

programme.title: Enter a Dragon
programme.desc: There's a new buyer for Kings publishing which is about to upend everything.

programme.title: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: The publishing house becomes a bone of contention and a personal disaster brings Nana and Bertha under one roof.

programme.title: Niniola
programme.desc: From unknown voice to global music sensation, today on Behind the Glam with Uti, we get in tune with award winning music Diva Niniola. Find out what’s new with the Grammy nominated songstress on this episode.

programme.title: Stephanie Coker
programme.desc: Vivacious and bubbly TV personality and actress, Stephanie Coker Aderinokun, is no stranger to the spotlight but on the show today, she reveals how she handles the spotlight shining a little too close to home.

programme.title: Cece
programme.desc: On Behind the Glam with Uti today, we strip off the layers to get into the heart of glamorous Reality star, actress, businesswoman and all-round slayer Cynthia Cece Nwadiora.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: An untameable twentysomething tests the bounds of being female in Nigeria.

programme.title: Second Thoughts
programme.desc: Sewa arrives in Abuja and begins to have second thoughts when nothing seems to go as planned.

programme.title: A Boulder For Sisyphus
programme.desc: No matter what Sewa does, she cannot seem to make her new boss happy, and now reaching her breaking point.

programme.title: Neighbor Danger
programme.desc: Jess moves into her apartment, met by a unique surprise.

programme.title: But Me Love
programme.desc: Shane and Nubia both start new jobs as Nico and Esther face a possible unexpected pregnancy.

programme.title: Enough!

programme.title: Fruit Episode with Chef Michael Cummings
programme.desc: Chef Michael Cummings knows that the fruits of your labour will never go unrecognized if you follow his secrets to preparing fresh seasonal fruit.

programme.title: Poultry Episode with Chef Tim McRoberts
programme.desc: Fair or fowl play, Chef Tim McRoberts demonstrates how to use the venerable chicken and not just focus on the breasts!

programme.title: Venezuelan Corn Recipes
programme.desc: Venezuelan-born Juan Pablo Gonzalez shows the versatility of corn and prepares sweet and savoury dishes with this traditional ingredient.

programme.title: Venezuela's National Bread
programme.desc: Passionate cook Juan Pablo Gonzalez introduces us to the arepa, a Venezuelan specialty, and shows four different and delicious fillings.

programme.title: Salmon and Strawberries
programme.desc: Chef Lauren Gulyas exercises her creativity with salmon cakes, strawberries and biscuits, and a mind-blowing final strawberry and salmon combo dish.

programme.title: Prawns and Pistachios
programme.desc: Chef Robert Jewell gets creative to meet the “P” challenge posed by prawns and pistachios with prosciutto-wrapped prawns and pistachio brittle.

programme.title: Ceviche
programme.desc: America’s Most Delicious has three different ways to make mouth watering Ceviche.

programme.title: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Veggies with Chef Tim McRoberts
programme.desc: Want to give your veggies a face lift? Try out Chef Tim McRoberts new recipes for beet custards, vegetable and ricotta stuffed cabbage rolls and a root vegetable puree with a pecan honey crust. Veggies have never looked so good.

programme.title: Chocolate with Chef Ned Bell
programme.desc: Chocolate is better than….almost anything! Chef Ned Bell creates two delicate and delicious decadent dishes that ooze with chocolate. These recipes will win you the gold medal with anyone and everyone you serve it to.

programme.title: Charity Car Wash
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team are pitching in to feed volunteers some great grilled chow including Lime Jalapeno Chicken Wings with Raita Dip; Beef Ribs with Vinegar Bbq Sauce; Killer Bbq Fries with Homemade Ketchup and Some Ice Cold Kiwi Melon Frostys

programme.title: Cottage Party
programme.desc: Matt and the Team join some friends at a Cottage Party to celebrate the end of school. They keep the festivities going with Bbqed Rib Eye Steaks with a Chimmi Churri Sauce; Jerk Pulled Pork Sandwiches with Fresh Mango; Roasted Garlic Onion Potatoes and Greek Salad in a Pita.

programme.title: Wrapped
programme.desc: Chef Spencer Watts has fun wrapping some of his favourite seafood to create delicious dishes with swordfish and shrimp.

programme.title: Garlic
programme.desc: Garlic is the star of the show as chef Spencer Watts cooks up tasty haddock and escargot treats.

programme.title: Crème Caramel
programme.desc: This episode of The 3 Best showcases the absolute best crème caramel recipes.

programme.title: Picnic
programme.desc: Picnics are fun, elegant, and filled with delicious food! Host Jessica McGovern shows us some of her favourite picnic-ready desserts.

programme.title: New Brunswick Scallops
programme.desc: Some of the biggest, juiciest scallops in the world are found off the coast of New Brunswick. Big fat pink scallops that sit up proud and succulent on a plate. Carlo joins local divers in a supa-dupa-scuba adventure as they harvest the sea floor for these taste treasures from the deep. Then it’s back to an old sea captains Inn for a scallop feast as never seen before.
