programme.title: Orca
programme.desc: In the waters off New Zealand, host Kina Scollay leaps into the water with a pod of orca. Watching his back is Ingrid Visser, world renowned orca expert. She’s been studying them for 30 years, knows who they are and what they might do. Join these two expe

programme.title: The Battle of Midway
programme.desc: 1942: The United States Navy has just been devastated at Pearl Harbor, but the Japanese attackers fail to destroy an important American asset: their aircraft carriers. To wipe out these carriers once and for all, Japanese Admiral Nagumo lays a trap for US

programme.title: The Battle of the Bulge
programme.desc: 1944: Adolf Hitler plays his last trump card, a gigantic offensive in the West, using his last troops and material. Leading the charge is Field Marshal Walther Model. If US General Omar Bradley can’t contain the German advance, Adolf Hitler could easily w

programme.title: The Battle of Kursk
programme.desc: 1943: Germany and Russia clash near the Soviet city of Kursk as each vies for control of the Eastern Front. The Germans are led by Field Marshal Erich von Manstein, an aristocratic master tactician. Facing him is the Red Army’s Marshal Zhukov, a ruthless,

programme.title: The Battle of El Alamein
programme.desc: We start this series with two of the most charismatic generals of all time. Field Marshal Erwin Rommel, the Desert Fox, and General Bernard Montgomery clash over a barren stretch of rocky desert in Egypt. Each is determined to outwit the other in a bloody

programme.title: Episode
programme.desc: In this first episode, two victims in a roller coaster crash seek compensation, and an innocent man tasered by police wants them held accountable. Some light is shed on people who fake car crashes to dupe insurance, and a woman wants to take down a beauty

programme.title: Episode
programme.desc: A young couple seek compensation after a nightmarish day out. After dentistry gone wrong the man responsible puts a stop to a claimants pay out. And a young cadet takes on the army in a six figure claim.

programme.title: Episode
programme.desc: One woman is locked in a legal battle after life threatening complications after cosmetic surgery. A family fights for a pay out after their home goes up in flames. A victim of a vicious dog attack takes his neighbor to court for compensation.

programme.title: Crashing Into the Moon
programme.desc: Over the next decade, the United States, Japan, India, China, Russia, and even private companies, are planning to send spacecraft to explore the moon. These missions are looking for resources that may one day allow humans to settle permanently in space.

programme.title: Saturn's Mysterious Moons
programme.desc: From the Cassini spacecraft comes one of the greatest photographic collections. Scientists are using it to uncover a trail of clues pointing to the energy sources and complex chemistry needed to spawn life.

programme.title: Mars: World That Never Was
programme.desc: Did Mars long ago develop far enough for life to arise? If so, does anything still live somewhere underground? The search for answers has revealed the forces that long ago doomed the Red Planet.

programme.title: Is The Universe Infinite?
programme.desc: Many astronomers now conclude that what we can see, the stars and galaxies that stretch out to the limits of our vision, represent only a small fraction of all there is. Does the universe go on forever? Where do we fit within it?

programme.title: Peru
programme.desc: Luke travels to the Amazonian rainforest to assist vets from his own charity.

programme.title: Nepal
programme.desc: Luke goes to work helping neglected equine and battling an STD blighting many street dogs.

programme.title: Costa Rica
programme.desc: Luke is outside his comfort zone as he travels the Central American rainforests.

programme.title: Liftoff

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: It's all about the fear factor this time, as Julia deals with a potted threat first, before catching a tiny house dweller, and scaling a rooftop to rescue a big snake.

programme.title: Life and Death

programme.desc: Julia will get a love-bite from her favorite snake, Bonny the dog continues her snake detection training, and then there's a deadly wrangle with a juvenile eastern brown.

programme.desc: Training is in full flow for Bonny the dog on her quest to sniff out snakes, but Julia is called poolside to fish out one cool snake, before facing an extremely close call.

programme.desc: While hunting, it can reach speeds of over 90 miles per hour but during its aerial displays it holds the all-time speed record of 242 miles per hour. So it’s not surprising that this powerful bird has conquered the planet and can be found on the five cont

programme.title: Submarines: The Invisible Weapon
programme.desc: You can’t see them. You can’t hear them. And you never know exactly where they are. The life of submarines is secret and fascinating. In this film, we go inside one of the French navy's legendary vessels, the Rubis, and to where the next nuclear submarine

programme.title: Saving Sharks, Raising Awareness
programme.desc: Every hour 10,000 sharks are fished worldwide. Yet, this mythical predator plays a key role in regulating marine life. So now, Jérôme Delafosse has launched The Shark Project - a plea to reconcile humankind with the scary shark - and is traveling the glob

programme.title: Africa's Primeval Oceans
programme.desc: The scene is the southern tip of Africa. Just off shore, two very different seas meet to form one of the most diverse marine environments on earth. The meeting of icy Atlantic and warm Indian waters not only affect life underwater, they are giant forces t

programme.title: Jess
programme.desc: Environmental philosophy student Jessica is looking to go beyond the surfing experience and see what more the ocean has to offer. Hanli steps up and instructs Jessica in the art of free diving. Her first dive is in a protected cove in a Marine Protected A

programme.title: Erica
programme.desc: Marine biologist Erica has spent the past eleven years researching the smallest life forms in the ocean, phytoplankton. Through Erica’s eyes, the role of these microorganisms in the marine ecosystem is clarified. Her dream is to swim with humpback whales,

programme.title: Monwabisi
programme.desc: Monwa’s life is tied to the sea. However, his relationship to the marine environment is based in fear. David and the crew aim to help him overcome this fear by getting him into the water. Monwa learns to free dive, and once the crew is satisfied that he c

programme.title: Life On Us: A Microscopic Safari
programme.desc: Just like planet Earth, our body is composed of diverse landscapes surprising wildlife. This award-winning film offers a unique microscopic safari, encountering the creatures that live, compete, feed, on breed on the surface or in the depths of our body.

programme.title: Paseka: The Easter Elephant
programme.desc: On Easter morning, a baby elephant is mysteriously abandoned by her herd in the wilds of Botswana’s Okavango Delta. Saved from certain death by a bizarre chain of events, she forces herself into a very unusual, captive elephant herd. This is “Paseka's” st

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather | Super El Niño
programme.desc: El Niño is a temperature anomaly in the Pacific Ocean that affects weather patterns around the globe. In this episode we show some of the costly and deadly weather that can result when a Super El Niño occurs.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather | Extreme Winters
programme.desc: In this episode we show some of the most extreme winter weather ever caught on camera, including a first-hand look at being buried by an avalanche.

programme.title: Angry Planet | River of Doubt
programme.desc: In 1914, U.S. President Theodore Roosevelt became the first person to navigate Brazil's "River of Doubt." The Angry Planet team returns to follow in his wake and investigate the changing climate in this remote part of the Amazon wilderness.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Polar Peril
programme.desc: George heads to Canada's far North to see how polar bears are coping.

programme.title: Angry Planet | The Unstoppable Force of Bangladesh
programme.desc: Ground zero for climate change and at risk of being wiped off the map, George is in Bangladesh during monsoon season to see how resilient and creative locals are adapting to their increasingly hostile environment.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Vanuatu
programme.desc: Climate change deniers claim volcanoes produce more greenhouse gases than fossil fuels do. George investigates this claim while revisiting the active volcano of Marum in Vanuatu. He dons a fire-suit and descends 1200 feet into the volcano.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Cabo Verde Volcano
programme.desc: When the Fogo volcano in the Cabo Verde Islands suddenly becomes active, George rushes to investigate. He returns with stark images and tragic stories from one of the most destructive volcano eruptions in recent years

programme.title: Angry Planet | Thunder Down Under
programme.desc: In Australia George teams up with storm chaser Jimmy Deguara to witness summer storms in the outback. While in Oz, he dives the magnificent Great Barrier Reef, and explores just how painful is the sting of the venomous Box Jellyfish.

programme.title: Family Funnies
programme.desc: Episode 103 - Part clip show and part comedian talking heads show, “Family Funnies” puts the fun in dysfunctional. The top family-friendly comedians speak directly to you the viewer to tell us about their funniest and most relatable family memories & milestones - as well as their parenting experiences and tips. The comedians cover family themed topics (Family Weddings, Family Vacations, Homework Rules) that are hilariously paired with similarly themed clip compilations. Warning: Results may vary, but will always be hilarious.

programme.desc: Episode 101 - We are showcasing all the funniest highlights from past seasons of America's Funniest Home Videos.

programme.title: AFV Family's Bonehead Brigade Countdown: True Blue Boneheads!
programme.desc: Episode 101 - ATTEN-SHUN! Welcome to the Bonehead Brigade, if you bumble, stumble, fall, flip or fail, we want you! Our mission? To save the world, one belly laugh at a time!

programme.title: AFV's Top 10 Late Night Laughs Countdown: Can't Stop The Funny
programme.desc: Episode 108 - What are you still up? Late nights are the perfect time to sit back, relax, and laugh. Join Janell Lenfert as she brings you the Top 10 funniest videos for your Late Night Laughs.

programme.title: AFV's Prank Academy: Pranks on Pranks
programme.desc: Episode 104 - Hosted by influencers Rachel Mueller and David Bonfadini, Prank Academy features the most hilarious pranks by kids for kids.

programme.title: Family Funnies
programme.desc: Episode 103 - Part clip show and part comedian talking heads show, “Family Funnies” puts the fun in dysfunctional. The top family-friendly comedians speak directly to you the viewer to tell us about their funniest and most relatable family memories & milestones - as well as their parenting experiences and tips. The comedians cover family themed topics (Family Weddings, Family Vacations, Homework Rules) that are hilariously paired with similarly themed clip compilations. Warning: Results may vary, but will always be hilarious.

programme.title: AFV's Ultimate Top 1000 Countdown
programme.desc: Episode 109 - We're counting down the top 1000 videos of the year. Get ready to laugh your face off as Alfonso Ribeiro brings you the most hilarious and shocking fails of 2020.

programme.title: Top 100 Fails Countdown
programme.desc: Episode 103 - Welcome to the Top 100 Fails Countdown! On this show, the only way to win is to fail. We’ve got hundreds of fails, but there can be only one final fail winner.

programme.title: AFV's Top 8 Showcase: Giggles and Grins Edition
programme.desc: Episode 103 - Guess what time it is? It's time to laugh! So sit back, relax, and get ready to LOL at top 8 videos from the AFV library. Hosted by Lili Fifield.

programme.title: Epic Funny Videos Countdown
programme.desc: Episode 101 - We're counting down the 100 funniest videos of all time...and each one is EPIC! Hope your ready for funny videos like “Kids Say The Craziest Things,” All the Babies, What The Family?!, and Goofs with the Gals!"....because each one is EPIC!

programme.title: Prank Video Showdown
programme.desc: Episode 110 - Welcome to Prank Video Showdown, where we show you the funniest jumps, scares, and who cares moments. Then we put them head to head for the Ultimate Prank of the Day!

programme.desc: We’ve got all of your favorite animals rights here from furry creatures to fierce dinos. Series featured are: “ZooMooPedia”, “Dinostory”, “ Lubinho, “Bath Time” and “Eddie Is A Yeti”.

programme.title: Sing-Along Songs
programme.desc: Sing-along with your fun favorites as well as some new songs that will make you dance. Episodes include such series as Storybots, Badanamu Pop Videos, Como POP, DJ Monkey, Urban Tails, Fluffy's Rhyme Time, Dance Fever and ZooMoo Groove.

programme.title: Get Up & Dance

programme.title: 6 Gaming Sleeper Hits of 2019 (So Far)
programme.desc: 2019 is already off to a great start. Games like Resident Evil 2, Devil May Cry and Skeiro show that this year is going to be a great one. But there are also some smaller games that have gone under the radar, and we think they deserve some love. Join ATG as we take a look at 6 Gaming Sleeper Hits of 2019 (So Far) and a bit of 2018.

programme.title: 6 Massive Gaming Twists Everyone Saw Coming
programme.desc: Plot twists are a tricky thing. They can improve a story greatly if they're done well, or leave you scratching your head in confusion if done poorly. But then there are plot twists that are so badly planned out that you manage to guess them long before they're revealed to you, and they're often pretty awful. Join ATG as we take a look at 6 terrible plot twists we saw coming from a mile away.

programme.title: Electric Fence; Mother and Child Reunion; Dog Saves Master; Life on a Line
programme.desc: A mother and her baby were miraculously saved after being thrown overboard in a raging storm, a mysterious force stops a man from touching a metal fence that had a hidden broken power line touching it, and a dog and his owner share a special connection as the dog saves the man's life. And more!

programme.title: Charlie & Me
programme.desc: This is the touching story of an 11-year-old girl who has an extraordinarily close relationship with her grandfather and a complex relationship with her widowed father. While other children her age go out on the town, Casey goes out with her grandfather Charlie, and loves every minute of it.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Despite his success in the school play Giles seems to have slid back to square one. Could the breakup of Antonia and Antony have anything to do with this? Dorothy encounters ninja warriors as she investigates the mysteries of the Vermont family home. Lew Siffer and Violet Profusion are on red alert.

programme.title: Episode 12
programme.desc: It is happiness week at Atlantis High, but a heartbroken Giles is not feeling the joy. Dorothy considers that perhaps her socially awkward son needs more therapy with Dr. Leggz. Coach Shane recruits players for the football team, and a desperate Mr. Dorsey attempts to instigate an emergency Plan B.

programme.title: Lone Star Kid
programme.desc: After witnessing a severe accident, a compassionate 11-year-old boy named Brian Zimmerman believes that the town of Crabb, Texas needs a mayor, and Brian thinks he is "the man" for the job. This inspiring true story shows the potential for good that even a young boy can have on his community.

programme.title: On Our Own
programme.desc: Four newly orphaned siblings are out of options. With no blood relatives, they are about to be sent to separate foster homes. To keep from being split apart, they decide to bust out of the orphanage and take off in a beat-up VW in search of an estranged uncle, but detectives soon catch their tail.

programme.title: Konrad
programme.desc: Konrad was created as a perfect “instant 8-year-old child” in a factory, but due to a glitch in the factory's computer, he is delivered to Bertie Bartolotti by mistake. When the factory realizes a mistake was made, and recalls Konrad, Konrad does not wish to leave his new family and friends.

programme.title: Paws to the Rescue
programme.desc: Upon deciding to testify against his former employer at a tobacco company, Harry Burton’s son, Charlie, is threatened by two thugs hired by the company to thwart Harry’s testimony. That is when the family’s two dogs come to the rescue.

programme.title: Necessary Parties
programme.desc: 14-year-old Chris Mills throws a wrench in his parents’ plans to divorce by hiring Archie Corelli, an auto-mechanic by day and a lawyer by night, to sue his parents and ultimately disrupt their plans to end their marriage.

programme.title: Safe Harbor
programme.desc: Doug and Robbie are about to set sail on a long trip when they unexpectedly find themselves foster parenting a group of troubled teenage boys. The experience changes their lives for the better, and they decide to stay in town and run the foster home for boys permanently.

programme.title: Take Me Home: The John Denver Story
programme.desc: John Denver achieved fame, fortune, and acclaim for his iconic country-pop music, but his sunny personality masked private pain and dark secrets that his celebrity could never heal.

programme.title: The Rivals
programme.desc: David Nelson has a rival, and his name is Will Thornberry, the Nelson's next door neighbor.

programme.title: The Pills
programme.desc: Ozzie decides that he wants to go on a diet so that he can fit into a pair of size 33 pants.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: At first Ozzie, attempts to persuade his son David to stand up for his rights, and not allow people to take advantage of his good nature, after David has an argument with a friend. However, Ozzie quickly regrets the advice he gave David.

programme.title: Starcrossed Lovers
programme.desc: Parsons' good-hearted sidekick Ben is now a member of the Robinson family group, but David objects when he discovers that Ben is in love with his daughter Joanna. Meanwhile, Emily must act as midwife when Elizabeth prepares to give birth.

programme.title: Never Name a Duck
programme.desc: Ritchie becomes very attached to two baby ducks that were left over from a show and decides to adopt them. Rob faces the daunting task of making Ritchie understand the consequence of attempting to keep wild animals as pets that may be happier living in the wild.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: On this episode of My Classic Car, Dennis checks out the Wellborn Muscle Car Collection.

programme.title: Thanksgiving Angel; Blind Skydiver Sees; Thanksgiving Feeding Needy; African Hijack
programme.desc: A poor mother of two can only afford to give her kids a meager Thanksgiving meal, when an elderly neighbor they had never met invites them to eat Thanksgiving dinner with her. When the mother returns the next day the to thank the woman, the apartment had been empty for years.

programme.title: God's Voice; McKay's Pennies; Doctor Rises from Ghetto; Ryan's Angels
programme.desc: A young Ben Carson turns his life around and becomes the youngest Chief of Pediatric Neurosurgery in the United States. A voice in the middle of the night told a bedridden hospital patient to "get up". She got up and was cured of her nerve disorder. And more miraculous stories.

programme.title: Starcrossed Lovers
programme.desc: Parsons' good-hearted sidekick Ben is now a member of the Robinson family group, but David objects when he discovers that Ben is in love with his daughter Joanna. Meanwhile, Emily must act as midwife when Elizabeth prepares to give birth.

programme.title: The Judge's Punishment
programme.desc: In Galilee, Jess works as a private teacher, mentoring Aviner's daughter, Elkie. Jess soon finds himself entangled in a family feud when Aviner's son, Daniel, feeling that he is being ignored by his father, proceeds to open his own, separate, business in spite of his father.

programme.title: The Miracle Maker
programme.desc: It is 14th century England amid the Black Plague when Jess unexpectedly saves Morgan, a performer at a local market, who Jess later discovers is a conman that sells fake potions to "cure" the plague. Morgan soon discovers that miracles really can happen if he refrains from spreading false hope.

programme.title: The 3
programme.desc: After the untimely death of his daughter, Jimmy finds himself at a crossroads in life. The choices he is about to make will determine the rest of his life. It is at this lowest point that Jimmy is visited by three guests, each with their own agenda, that will steer him toward his destiny.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: On this episode of My Classic Car, Dennis travels to the Gulf Coast for Cruisin' the Coast.

programme.title: Shaytana's Eye
programme.desc: The peaceful Kingdom of Kale is thrown into chaos after the Citadel is overthrown by the dark forces of Kreel and Xax. After his family farm is destroyed by the Xaxian army, young William Tell is visited by the mystical Kalem who reveals that he has been chosen to seek the legendary Crystal Arrow.

programme.title: Swarm
programme.desc: Princess Vara has fallen ill, and the group is taken in by Harana, a healer and leader of a group called The Watchers. She leads them to a bountiful valley which does not seem to appear on any map. But it soon becomes evident that this idyllic valley is secretly controlled by Kreel.

programme.title: Combat
programme.desc: William is in despair, believing that the spirit of Kalem has been overtaken by the dark forces. Conflict arises amidst the group, and Aruna goes after Xax, but gets herself captured. William joins a band of prisoners in order to sneak into the Citadel to save Aruna.

programme.title: Made for Each Other
programme.desc: Newlyweds, John and Jane Mason, struggle through their first year a marriage, plagued by money problems, illness, and a meddlesome live-in mother-in-law. To top it all off, their baby son is dying of pneumonia, and can only be saved by a serum that must be flown from Salt Lake City to New York.

programme.title: A Cat and Mouse Game
programme.desc: A family and their cat, Marcel, encounter a pet mouse (Cheeky) left behind by the former residents of a summer cottage. Like the classic comedy series, “Tom and Jerry”, Marcel watches and attempts to capture the mischievous Cheeky who constantly eludes him. What will become of the chase in time?

programme.title: Skeleton in the Cupboard
programme.desc: The Painter family have been magicians for generations, and 14-year-old Cherry wants to be the first world-class female magician. Her Grandad created a world-famous trick called 'The Skeleton in the Cupboard,’ but is it worth revisiting?

programme.title: Between Life and Death
programme.desc: 12-year-old Jamie Irving and his father, Rick, are opposites. When Rick discovers illegal activities at his company, he becomes entangled in a mystery that results in his spirit disconnecting from his body, and only Jamie can see him.

programme.title: Maricela
programme.desc: Maricela and her mother Eugenia have fled El Salvador for America. When Eugenia becomes a live-in housekeeper to the affluent Gannett family, conflict arises when Maricela clashes with teenage Stacy Gannett. Can Maricela win Stacy's friendship while remaining true to her own ideals and values?

programme.title: Book 4: The Sea of Adventure (Part 2)
programme.desc: Bill and the children arrive on Penguin Island. While Bill goes fishing to secure an evening meal, the children decide to explore, enthralled with the notion of living in the wild. However, the children fail to notice the strange, wild-haired man watching them named Te Ariki, who they soon befriend.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: On this episode of My Classic Car, Dennis travels to the Gulf Coast for Cruisin' the Coast.

programme.title: The Spirit of Kale
programme.desc: During an attempt to infiltrate Kreel in his stronghold, Kalem transforms into a bird but is sensed by Shaytana's Eye and badly wounded. To heal herself she must drink from the Crystal Stream, but she is far too weak to make the journey alone. So, Will and Aruna must assist her.

programme.title: The 1920s
programme.desc: Mobsters, jazz, and turbulent economic times mark the 1920s. Silent film makes the transition to the talkies as sound comes to the silver screen. Criminals find that there is one less place to hide with the invention of the lie detector, and the Space Age is launched.

programme.title: Shaytana's Eye
programme.desc: The peaceful Kingdom of Kale is thrown into chaos after the Citadel is overthrown by the dark forces of Kreel and Xax. After his family farm is destroyed by the Xaxian army, young William Tell is visited by the mystical Kalem who reveals that he has been chosen to seek the legendary Crystal Arrow.

programme.title: Halloween Party
programme.desc: Ozzie and Thorny take it upon themselves to plan a non-costume party as the only costumed individuals, dressing up as Satan and a Scotsman, respectively. Meanwhile, Ricky and David attend a Halloween Party at school, and the Nelson household is besieged by children demanding candy, or else.

programme.title: Riviera Ballet
programme.desc: Ozzie has two tickets to the Riviera Ballet, but Harriet does not wish to attend the event because the dancers in the ballet will be wearing skimpy attire.

programme.title: Thorny's Gift
programme.desc: Ozzie is insulted after buying Thorny a lighter for his birthday, wrapping it in Christmas paper, mailing it, and not getting a "thank you” for the gift. Tired of listening to Ozzie’s bellyaching, his family forces him to confront Thorny about the matter by locking Ozzie out of the house until he does so.

programme.title: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: Newlyweds Ben and Joanna's happiness is short-lived when Parsons leads a pirate attack on the family. The arrival of a merchant ship rescues the Robinsons. Back in Boston, David stands trial for the murder of Parson's brother.

programme.title: Bank Book 6565696
programme.desc: Rob discovers Laura's secret bank account book and wonders why she is keeping it a secret from him. Rob concludes she must be saving money to buy him a birthday present, such as a new movie projector she knows he wants. When he receives a shirt instead of a projector, the mystery perplexes Rob.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: On this episode of My Classic Car, Dennis travels to London, Ontario for Steve Plunkett's Country Cruize-In.

programme.title: Sioux City; Dade County Canal; Lady in Green; Affair of the Heart
programme.desc: A woman is brought back to life after her car sinks at the bottom of a canal. Is a mysterious lady in green to thank for Joe Trucker's miraculous recovery? The patients of an experimental heart surgery meet and fall in love. And many more stories that prove the existence of miracles.

programme.title: Baby Comes to Life: Burning from Within; Tara's Angels; Healed by Kindness; Dannion Brinkley
programme.desc: A baby is born lifeless and declared dead, but after 78 minutes, miraculously comes to life. A Vietnam veteran is struck by lightning while talking on the phone and is dead for the next 28 minutes. After his experience he gained the ability to predict the future and communicate with the dead.

programme.title: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: Newlyweds Ben and Joanna's happiness is short-lived when Parsons leads a pirate attack on the family. The arrival of a merchant ship rescues the Robinsons. Back in Boston, David stands trial for the murder of Parson's brother.

programme.title: Heads you Lose
programme.desc: During the French Revolution, while working as a servant in the Chateau of Pierre Mandin in 1792, Jess is forced to serve Pierre's buffoonish, drunken son, Phillipe. With the threat of the Republicans increasing, Phillipe is disguised as a servant, and experiences life from a new perspective.

programme.title: The Runaway
programme.desc: It is 1850. Jess befriends 16-year-old Samuel, who is expected to take over his deceased father's job as the village baker. Samuel dreams of travelling the world and “being somebody.” At the spur of the moment, Samuel decides to run away with a minstrel troupe to travel the world.

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: With Oregon in their sights, Dylan openly challenges Brock’s decision to escape Chicago for a simpler life in Oregon. Just when smoother roads appear to be prevailing, something profoundly mysterious occurs that changes the Turner's plans.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: When things appear to be going from bad to worse, God’s miraculous energy inspires Dylan to contemplate his depth of faith. The question is, will Brock and Dylan together discover the power that God’s love has to cast away all fear?

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: On this episode of My Classic Car, Dennis goes for a spin in a Lincoln Cosmo and Model A Rod.

programme.title: Escape into Fear
programme.desc: William and the rebels suspect Xax is plotting with Kreel who has a reputation of delivering powerful, dark magic. After Princess Vara escapes during a battle with Xaxian warriors, William is conflicted when he discovers that there is a bounty on his head that also threatens the villagers.

programme.title: Master of Doubt
programme.desc: During a hunt with a group of Warriors, Xax is ecstatic to cross paths with Will and his rebel forces. After they are chased by the horsemen on an open plain with seemingly no escape, the mist clears and reveals a mysterious castle. But the group soon discovers that this is no ordinary castle.

programme.title: Resurrection
programme.desc: With the apparent death of Kalem, the band splits up. Kreel assures Xax that the battle to win the Kingdom has been won. William has banished himself to a life of solitude, working on a pig farm. But after Kalem appears to him again, William sets out for one more chance to find the Crystal Arrow.

programme.title: The Green Dress
programme.desc: 13-year-old Rosa feels unwelcome at the School of Performing Arts where she is bullied by the spiteful Lucy who is threatened by Rosa's talents and increasing popularity. Things change considerably when Rosa purchases a second-hand dress.

programme.title: First Flight: A Mother Hummingbird's Story
programme.desc: One day, one of nature’s smallest birds, a Black-chinned Hummingbird, built her nest atop a backyard clothesline. This enchanting and remarkably detailed film reveals the tireless efforts of the hummingbird mother who raises and cares for two chicks from their hatching to their leaving the nest.

programme.title: Poker Night In America | S05 E17 | Top Golf

programme.title: Poker Night In America | S05 E18 | Way Down In The Valley

programme.title: Poker Night In America | S05 E19 | P.O.W.

programme.title: Stoked on Fishing - An Unforgettable Trip, South Lake, Part Two
programme.desc: This show was filmed in late October of 2019. Four months prior, in June of 2019, Tim Carnahan was diagnosed with Glioblastoma, Brain Cancer. According to Tim's medical team, his life expectancy could be between three months and 18 months. Fast forward to now, 2020; today's update is one we hoped would never come. With a heavy heart and tear-filled eyes, we share with you that Tim Carnahan has passed away after battling for close to 12 months. It only fits that the last words to pass his lips were I love you, Lory, and keep fishing. While his time on earth was cut short, the amount of joy he experienced and shared with others was genuinely tremendous and will never be forgotten. If you would like to help out in any way, lory and friends have put together a Go Fund Me page to ease the financial burden of medical bills and afford lory some time to greave and transition into life without Tim. We love you, Tim. Rest in peace, buddy.

programme.title: Stoked on Fishing - Bluefin Tuna and Yellowtail Fishing on the El Dorado
programme.desc: Shea McIntee and the crew take a two and a half-day trip on one of our all-time favorite charter boats, the El Dorado, out of Long Beach Sportfishing. We fish on San Clemente Island and venture offshore in search of tuna.

programme.title: Operation Fishing Freedom - Vietnam Medic John Hitchens

programme.title: Ontario Experience - Crane's Lochaven Wilderness Lodge
programme.desc: Troy Lindner boats into Crane's Lochaven Wilderness Resort on Northeastern Ontario's French River, an outstanding multi-species fishery steeped in history.

programme.title: Hobie Fishing - Florida Offshore Kayak Fishing for Permit in the Open Blue
programme.desc: Traveling across the country to Captiva Island, Florida, our other favorite coast to kayak fish. Hundreds of large permit school up on an offshore reef where two of our lucky Hobie kayak anglers find themselves right in the middle of it.

programme.title: Hobie Fishing - Kayak Fishing for Albies on Cape Cod
programme.desc: Got Albies? A kayak is perfect for chasing these line screaming speed machines around as they boil up on schools of micro bait. Can you think of a more stealthy wait to target these finicky fish? On the tail end of this show we catch up with fly fishing legend, Lefty Kreh, and talk about the good ol’ days on back bay circa 1950 catching largemouth bass, and then we test it out ourselves from our Hobies.

programme.title: Hobie Fishing - Kayak Fishing Heaven in Florida's Fellsmere
programme.desc: Big bass, alligators and incredible bird life are all part of the amazing ecosystem that make up Fellsmere Reservoir. Watch as our anglers take their Hobie fishing kayaks across the country one more time to the ultimate kayak fishing heaven in Florida.

programme.title: Operation Fishing Freedom - Korean War POW Darrell Krenz
programme.desc: The story of a Wisconsin soldier who reveals his real-life struggles as a 37-month prisoner of war during the Korean War.

programme.desc: Summertime sight fishing at Lake Havasu with Justin Kerr

programme.title: Jarrett Edwards - Post Spawn Havasu
programme.desc: Jarrett and FLW Touring Pro Roy Hawk head to Lake Havasu for some post spawn bass

programme.title: Lund Fishing - Deep Water Bass Tactics
programme.desc: Professional bass angler Jeff Gustafson along with Jason Johnson reveal their go to baits for deep-water largemouth bass

programme.title: Lund Fishing - Pre-Spawn Smallmouth Bass
programme.desc: Kyle Peterson & Mitch Anderson explain their favorite presentations for early season smallmouth bass

programme.title: Jimmy Houston Fishing - Jimmy, Joe and a Kayak
programme.desc: Jimmy and Joe Hall are catching bass and crappie in Oklahoma, Jimmy does some kayak fishing

programme.title: Jimmy Houston Fishing - Tablerock Lake Adventure
programme.desc: Jimmy is fishing the Clear Water of Tablerock Lake in Missouri.

programme.title: One More Cast - Dead in the Water
programme.desc: Dead in the Water

programme.title: Ontario Experience - Witch Bay Lodge
programme.desc: Troy Lindner chases smallmouth bass and walleye at NW Ontario's Witch Bay Lodge on Lake of the Woods, making new friends in the process.

programme.title: Hobie Fishing - Kayak Fishing Heaven in Florida's Fellsmere
programme.desc: Big bass, alligators and incredible bird life are all part of the amazing ecosystem that make up Fellsmere Reservoir. Watch as our anglers take their Hobie fishing kayaks across the country one more time to the ultimate kayak fishing heaven in Florida.

programme.title: Operation Fishing Freedom - Korean War POW Darrell Krenz
programme.desc: The story of a Wisconsin soldier who reveals his real-life struggles as a 37-month prisoner of war during the Korean War.

programme.title: Stoked on Fishing - The Magdalena Bay Experience, Part Two
programme.desc: One of the best parts of traveling is the pleasant surprises that come along every trip. In last week's episode, Shea McIntee and the crew had a remarkable day of Marlin fishing in Madalena Bay. Now we find out Madalena Bay doesn't only have fantastic offshore fishing, it also has inshore fishing that is out of this world. Shea's captain takes us to some of his favorite spots to catch Red Snapper, Snook, Corbina, and a fish we have never seen before, Palometa.

programme.title: Stoked on Fishing - An Unforgettable Trip, South Lake
programme.desc: Going camping and trout fishing in the Sierras is one of our favorite things to do. For the first time, Shea McIntee and the crew head down to South Lake Bishop. What makes this trip unique is that we get to fish with some good friends.

programme.title: Wired2Fish - 5 Tips For Texas-Rigged Worms
programme.desc: Jacob Wheeler talks about the importance of hook and weight selection and his top 2 retrieval methods when fishing Texas-rigged ribbontail worms offshore.

programme.title: Brauer Bass Battles: Lake Guntersville Largemouth
programme.desc: The Brauers compete to see who can best figure out how to catch largemouth bass on Lake Guntersville, Alabama.

programme.title: Pro vs Joe - Coach Em' Up2
programme.desc: Brent Chapman’s Pro vs Joe Coach Em' Up2

programme.title: Pro vs Joe - Sweet Caroline
programme.desc: Brent Chapman Pro vs Joe Sweet Caroline

programme.title: Jarrett Edwards - Follow Up Bass
programme.desc: Jarrett Edwards and Bobby Barrack tackle the California Delta in search of some cold font bass

programme.title: Operation Fishing Freedom - Normandy Veteran Dominic Errichiello
programme.desc: World War II Veteran Dominic Errichiello saw everything from the Shores of Normandy on D-Day to the fiercest moments of the Battle of the Bulge, and is eternally grateful that he made it home to create the thing he cares about most: Family.

programme.title: Hank Parker Outdoors: Blueback bassin'
programme.desc: Hank kicks off his 35th year on television in search of largemouth bass that are chasing the Blueback Herring on Lake Murray, his home lake.

programme.title: Hank Parker Outdoors: Fishing with Warriors on the Water
programme.desc: Ft. Bragg North Carolina is home to "Warriors On The Water". For their incredible commitment & service to our country, this event is a chance to say "thank you" for the price paid for freedom.

programme.title: Wired2Fish - Kayak Bass Fishing Untapped Lakes
programme.desc: Wired2Fish's McKeon Roberts discovers an epic bite for big smallmouth bass using jerkbaits on a new lake.

programme.title: Brauer Bass Battles: Lake Guntersville Largemouth
programme.desc: The Brauers compete to see who can best figure out how to catch largemouth bass on Lake Guntersville, Alabama.

programme.title: Hobie Fishing - Ike at His Best Featuring MLF Star Mike Iaconelli
programme.desc: Whether it’s redfish in the bayous of Louisiana, halibut off Southern California, or smallmouth bass in the rivers of the northeast, Bass Pro angler Mike Iaconelli always has fun out of his Hobie fishing kayak.

programme.title: Angling Buzz - Angling Organization

In this episode, we delve deeper into the topic of "angling organization."

programme.title: The Reluctant Pilot
programme.desc: Derek, an apprehensive adventurer, leaves the comforts of suburbia to hunt feral hogs with guest star Jeff Kriet.

programme.title: Offshore Gulf Grouper
programme.desc: Show host, Jason South joins Capt. Seth Hayes for some incredible offshore gag grouper action off the coast of Ft.Myers.

programme.title: Tested On Animals
programme.desc: Funny things happen when you are tarpon fishing. Rob and Bou continue to fish their clients for early season silver kings in The Everglades.

programme.title: Bad Mood
programme.desc: Bou and Rob fish clients in the Cheeca Lodge & Spa Tarpon Invitational. They battle through wind and rain in this, the first tournament of the tarpon season.

programme.title: Atlantic Gladiators
programme.desc: New England pelagics like swordfish and bluefin tuna bring more than sport. It's a heavyweight, high octane battle, and the angler is the underdog.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: Three days, five release flags, 400 photos: the SFTV crew and Marlin magazine join forces to chase blue marlin and sailfish at Panama's Tropic Star Lodge.

programme.title: Red Winter
programme.desc: A road trip, a mothership, and a wild spirit are what’s required to find monster redfish deep in the Louisiana marsh.

programme.title: Jacks Be Roiling
programme.desc: When word gets out that Jack Crevalle are in a feeding frenzy, Justin and fellow Captain Kyle Pitts speed down the Intracoastal Waterway to find them doing just that.

programme.title: Aftermath Bite
programme.desc: Travis and Justin head out after Hurricane Michael and find it hard to keep fish off the hook

programme.title: Top Redfish
programme.desc: Justin and Captain Matt Smith discover that topwater redfishing is a lesson in quick thinking and accurate casting.

programme.title: Metro Movements
programme.desc: As the musky range has been expanded with stocking near metropolitan areas, some great musky fishing opportunities have developed close to many musky anglers. However, with increased fishing and boating pressure, consistency requires fishing at odd hours; a thorough knowledge of spots; and, the ability to modify lures to adapt to the conditions. Jim Saric, pro guide Ryan McMahon and musky hunter field editor Bob Turgeon fish the Minneapolis metro area in search of pressured-water muskies

programme.title: Tamarack Muskies
programme.desc: Lake of the Woods in Ontario, Canada, is known as musky central, and the Morson area is in the heart of some of the best musky fishing on LOW. Tamarack Island Wilderness Lodge, located 9 miles west of Morson, is an area surrounded by both large and small islands loaded with muskies. Jim Saric, Musky Hunter Field Editor Bob Turgeon and Pro Guide Ryan McMahon reveal the secrets to fishing this section of LOW.

programme.title: Finesse Smallies
programme.desc: Al Lindner and Ted Stewner fine-tune subtle jigging presentations for early-season smallmouth bass.

programme.title: Canadian Brookies
programme.desc: Dan Lindner and Dave Csanda cast jerkbaits for trophy brook trout on the Nipigon River, Ontario.

programme.title: Sloppy Bass
programme.desc: Catching giant bass in the slop. It takes the right gear coupled with a no-holds-barred mentality to weed ‘em out

programme.title: Togiak II
programme.desc: Growing Up with a BIG Backyard

programme.title: Georgia 1

programme.title: Action Craft 17, Bluewave 2800 Makaira, Sailfish 360CC Elite
programme.desc: Today, on Florida Sportsman Best Boat... for inshore anglers who want to cross open water comfortably and fish a variety of locations effectively, we’ll be taking a look at the Action Craft 1720 Gen III; for the fisherman with a growing desire to venture further offshore, economically, we’ll be looking at the Blue Wave 2800 Makaira; and...for the fishing family that loves to spend their weekends exploring bluewater, we’ll be taking a look at Sailfish 360CC Elite.

programme.title: Classic 25 Mako Intro, Rare 23 Hoog

programme.title: Charlotte Harbor Slam with Chris Wittman

programme.title: No Rut to Complain: Alaska-Yukon Moose
programme.desc: Greg and his father head out on a post-Route moose hunt into a valley that holds incredible moose. The short days and shy moose make for challenging October hunting.

programme.title: Back in the Outback Part 3

programme.desc: Chris Dorsey takes in two of North America's thrilling hunts with a elk hunt in western Colorado and a nighttime hog hunt in North Texas.

programme.title: Goodbye Season 8
programme.desc: Another season in the books, and another sad goodbye. Catch the season 8 wrap-up as we look back on some of our favorite moments. We also pay tribute to Soggy Acres' Lucy Belle, Jeff's special chocolate lab, and her contributions to the show.

programme.desc: Fishing Shebandowan lake in northwest Ontario. The perfect place to bounce up and spin precious walleye gold

programme.title: Postpawn Smallies
programme.desc: Fishing for postspawn smallmouth bass. Subtle lures and swimming retrieves match the depth and mood of smallies on the move

programme.title: Ford Frontier Fishing
programme.desc: Bourbon Street calls up the sounds and flavors of the French Quarter, but Flip Pallot is called up to another part of Louisiana, south of New Orleans, in search of redfish. Join Flip as he flies across clear waters, casts gem-like flies and feels the force of fighting fish - on this episode of Ford's Fishing Frontiers.

programme.title: South Dakota Trout
programme.desc: For 30 years, Preston Sharp and Jim Whitlock, have shared South Dakota's black hills fishing. In that time, White Wood Creek has been resurrected, from a casualty of the mining industry, to spawning grounds for many species of trout. An old mine that once produced gold and pollution, now purifies the waters of the creek and enriches the surrounding eco-system, and once again, has provided the opportunity to explore the backcountry to find wild mountain trout - see what lies ahead on Ford's Fishing Frontiers.

programme.title: Summer Trolling Strategies
programme.desc: When fishing large flats in summer there are many presentation options. Cool temperatures in early summer can delay weed growth and scatter muskies, making trolling the most effective approach. Jim Saric and Trophy Hunter Tom Sullivan battle big winds and big water while trolling for summer muskies.

programme.title: Young’s Wilderness Muskies
programme.desc: Steven’s Bay on Lake of the Woods in Ontario, Canada, is a neglected gem loaded with muskies. Jim Saric, Pro Guide and Lodge Owner Perry Anniuk, and musky hunter Bob Turgeon navigate the waters surrounding Young’s Wilderness Camp, and detail the keys to catching muskies in this section of Lake of the Woods.

programme.title: Wingshooters Paradise
programme.desc: Alaska’s the ‘Easiest’ Place to Bird Hunt

programme.title: California Tule's
programme.desc: Rick Oncken is on the hunt of a lifetime, chasing the rarest of the North American elk species. You’ll see why Fort Hunter Liggett plays a vital role in our U.S. military, as well as conservation.

programme.title: Fast and Furious In Colorado
programme.desc: RMEF Team Elk member and former Indy car driver Johnny Unser joins TE host Brandon Bates as they attempt to double-up on rutting Colorado bulls.

programme.title: Yellow Creek Wyoming
programme.desc: Wind and cold weather are on the docket for hunters in Wyoming with Dallas Safari Club’s Outfitter of the Year B. Joe Coy. Getting into range of these mature whitetails is tough when the stiff wind keeps changing directions on Mr. Whitetail.

programme.title: No Laughing Matter
programme.desc: Larry Weishuhn – the Elvis of deer hunters – heads to Machen Ranch in south Texas to rattle in a mature whitetail buck during the peak of the rut. Senator John McCain joins Larry to discuss the second amendment and the future of deer hunting.

programme.title: Top of the Flyway
programme.desc: It's an annual pilgrimage at the as Chris Dorsey and brother Joe venture to Alberta to catch the beginning of North America's annual waterfowl migration.

programme.desc: The brigade’s teamwork is tested when the rough waters of the Athabasca River cause their canoes to capsize. Having completed the mountainous western section of the race, the brigade sets off into the rugged and remote wilderness of Northeastern Manitoba. Long days on the water navigating the complex tangles of river channels and beaver dams, and a grueling portage around Robinson Falls, bring the team to the brink of collapse.

programme.title: Supernatural Bass

programme.desc: While in Kansas, Casey Keefer uncovers a big piece of the ‘Shakes’ puzzle, honing in on where he’s living. In Ohio Chris Keefer and Jason Brown hunt a front that has the deer on their feet.

programme.title: Midwest_Whitetail
