programme.title: Midwest_Whitetail
programme.desc: On this week's episode, we first join Josh Sparks and Kaleb Greiner shed hunting in Iowa. They've picked up some good antlers including two bucks they know well. Then we join Jared Mills who discusses why frost seeding clover can be so productive and how

programme.title: German Rally Championship 1983
programme.desc: The German rally championship is one of the most popular motorsport series which has been running since 1970. In its 1983 race the sport model from Opel saw exceptional success.

programme.title: Travel With Silk Way
programme.desc: The Way Road Rally is repositioning itself for the 2019 season. For the first time ever, the transcontinental off-road race will take its participants across mountains, deserts and endless steppes. The teams will also pass the deepest lake in the world, Lake Baikal. Start of the Silk Roadf Rally is in Irkutsk in the south of Russia, further stages take participants to Mongolia and China. MOTORVISION TV shows the highlights of the 2019 Silk Road Rally.

programme.title: Audi Quattro - El Rally Clasico
programme.desc: Advantage through Technology on the rally tracks. The Audi Quattro surprises its opponents.

programme.title: Ferruccio Lamborghini
programme.desc: In the village of Sant'Agata Bolognese lie the roots of the iconic Italian brand Lamborghini. In 1964, Ferruccio Lamborghini targeted building the best sports cars in the world, a bold move, being located only a few kilometers from Ferrari. - Despite that, his first model, the 350 GT, left the competition from Maranello behind. And many more exciting and extraordinary sports car models followed.

programme.title: Sabine Schmitz
programme.desc: People called her the "Queen of the Nordschleife" when she used to drive her Porsche or BMW racing cars at the Nurburgring's famous Nordschleife. Sabine Schmitz was a successful racing driver before she took a career turn by working as a presenter for German television and later the famous BBC show "Top Gear".

programme.title: Mercedes 280 SE meets America - Long Island
programme.desc: Tillmann Miritz’s trip to find automobile rarities in the US goes from the Manhattan Bridge to Long Island. His Mercedes convertible brings him to the Wollfer Estate Vineyard, where German vintner Roman Roth grows some of the best wines. His garage hides an automotive dream: the “Farmers Dream”. The Chevrolet 3100 stands for the rural “American Way of Life” like almost no other car.

programme.title: Vehicle Inspector Thomas Eschenbach
programme.desc: Small incident but a big impact. After accidents, a damage appraisal should give a bit of clarity to the situation. The man to do this: Vehicle inspector Thomas Eschenbach.

programme.title: ADAC Sportgala 2019
programme.desc: Glanzender Abschluss einer spannenden Motorsportsaison: Auf der ADAC Sportgala 2019 ehrte der Club in seiner Zentrale in Munchen am Freitag die erfolgreichsten Motorsportler der Saison. Vor rund 400 geladenen Gasten aus Sport, Politik und Wirtschaft wurden Motocrosser Dennis Ullrich als ADAC Motorsportler des Jahres und Tourenwagen-Pilot Max Hesse als ADAC Junior Motorsportler des Jahres geehrt. Der ehemalige Autostadt-Geschaftsfuhrer Otto Ferdinand Wachs wurde mit einem Ehrenpreis von ADAC Klassik ausgezeichnet. Die "Nacht der Sieger" endete mit einem Auftritt von Max Giesinger.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Martial arts specialist Ramazan creates a fight choreography that involves four stuntmen who play secret agents that try to nail him down. Will Ramazan be able to break free from this unpleasant situation? Who will spectacularly take off with a car? Find out in this episode of Stunt Heroes.

programme.title: Alarm in the Ski Resort
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes from Action Concept are still at their ski resort, partying hard in their spare time. They prepare a spectacular stunt involving a station wagon that is catapulted 50 meters high into the air. If everything goes according to plan, the high-flying car is supposed to crash into another car that is placed on a meadow.

programme.title: Mercedes Races again 1954/55
programme.desc: 1954. Mercedes races again. After more than 20 years of abstinence Mercedes returns in the Grand-Prix - circuit. With a lot of engagement, advanced engineering and with the best Grand-Prix-drivers of the world.

programme.title: Mercedes S-Class
programme.desc: Since the 1950s the Mercedes S-Class has been the epitome of luxury, comfort and safety. The S-Class sets the standard for prestige and technology. Every model is a bestseller; every model becomes a status symbol of the rich and powerful. Car History tells the story of this 'special class' that prevails against any crises, social changes and its competition.

programme.title: Arabella Classics
programme.desc: Rare Automobiles and stunning views! The Arabella Classics, one of the most exclusive Classic Car Rallies in Europe.

programme.title: British Convertibles
programme.desc: Whether it is the Jaguar F-Type, the Aston Martin V8 Vantage or the Bentley Continental, British convertibles are elegant and exclusive. These UK roadsters are more sporty than many other cars and enjoy a certain cult status all over the world. After all, fast open-top two-seaters were invented in the UK. DreamCars presents the most breathtaking British cabriolets of all time.

programme.title: German Limousines
programme.desc: Whether it is the Mercedes S-Class, the BMW 7-series or the Audi A8, German limousines enjoy a great reputation as they stand for perfection and prestige. Limousines „Made in Germany“ are considered embodiments of a certain status and set standards when it comes to comfort, pioneering technologies and safety. DreamCars presents the most famous, beautiful and most luxurious German limousines.

programme.title: Bentley Bentayga
programme.desc: At first glance a typical Bentley. Only higher and with a rear end that we have so far not seen. In its 4-year development period, it completed the most comprehensive test program of the company's history. The expectations for it are gigantic, because it is not supposed to be just any SUV, but the first luxury sports utility vehicle in the world. - With the Bentley Bentayga, the British traditional brand is entering the fastest growing segment of the market. Over 600 horse power. At a cost of over 200,000 Euros. The Bentayga is a superlative on wheels.

programme.title: German SUVs
programme.desc: The BMW X5M, Audi Q7, Mercedes GLS and Porsche Cayenne Turbo are among the strongest and fastest SUVs in the world. Sports utility vehicles made in Germany are the embodiment of technical perfection, superior performance and unique comfort. On the road they feel like a sportscar and at the same time are able to master every obstacle in open terrain like an off-roader. DreamCars presents the most expensive, exclusive and fastest German SUVs.

programme.title: Alfa Romeo Stelvio QV - 2019
programme.desc: The Alfa Romeo Stelvio QV is one of the sportiest SUV ever. With its 510 hp from the 2.9 litre V6 bi-turbo, the Quadrifoglio drives almost like a real sports car. During my test drive on the Stilfser Joch, I took a close look at what the Alfa Romeo Stelvio QV AT8-Q4 really can deliver. Source: http://quickcarreview.com

programme.title: Across Utah on a Harley, Part 1
programme.desc: Utah, land of red rocks. That's what it was called by the original inhabitants. 1.500 miles through the most beautiful and dramatic scenery in America lay before the team. Hardly anywhere else on earth are there so many natural wonders in such a small area.

programme.title: Harley-Davidson - Project LiveWire
programme.desc: Harley-Davidson “LiveWire”. Using a prototype, the US cult brand researches what bikers expect from an electric Harley.

programme.title: Across Utah on a Harley, Part 2
programme.desc: Back on the road in glorious sunshine and clear cold air. There is still snow from last night on the U.S. 191 to Monticello. In the "Running Iron Inn" we are invited to lunch by Charly DeLorm. The quaint location is part restaurant and part museum. It used to be a rental location for film utensils. We meet Bob, the owner of the Saloon and he knows some of the shop's history...

programme.title: Part 01 - Grand Prix of Italy
programme.desc: Highlights from the opening round in Pietramurata, Italy The FIM Trial World Championship is the world's most prestigious motorcycle trials championship. Its 2019 season consists of seven rounds with Toni Bou returning as the defending champion.

programme.title: Carbon Parts for Motorbikes
programme.desc: Carbon fiber on a motorcycle: Does that even make sense? We show what the Formula 1 carbon material is capable of.

programme.title: Snow Mobiles
programme.desc: The Snowmobile race in Saalbach-Hinterglemm in Austria is the Rally Monte Carlo of the Alps, the winter Formula One. 24 teams compete, and only the top 14 qualify for the grand finale on the 850 metres-long track that calls to mind the legendary Monte Carlo street races. We witnessed the competition and talked to the racers and organizers.

programme.title: Yeti Trophy
programme.desc: The Yeti Trophy was a winter race for ATVs and side-by-sides. The dirtier, muddier and more difficult - the better! In 2012, 200 racers competed in this rough-and-tough off-road event in Suhl, Thuringia, a town that is still famous as the birthplace of the iconic 'Schwalbe', a moped that was manufactured back in the day in the GDR. We talked to some of the racers and explored the track.

programme.title: Henry Ford
programme.desc: His name is known all over the world. In the early 20th century, automotive pioneer Henry Ford revolutionized the world of car manufacturing with the foundation of the Ford Motor Company and his introduction of the assembly line technique in his factory and the iconic Model T.

programme.title: Classic Cars Made in Japan!
programme.desc: There is only one Toyota Corolla Levin 1973 in Germany. We took this unique model to the test. Also: Nippon cult classics in sports attire. The Datsun 240 Z and Fairlady Roadster in our retrospective. And: the Toyota Land Cruiser. For more than 40 years this iconic Japanese 4x4 has been seen and driven all over the world.

programme.title: Quattro "The new Dimension 1985"
programme.desc: In 1985 Audi needed to make its mark in motorsport and did exactly that with the 'Quattro'. On the rally scene the guys down at Ingolstadt (Germany) got their hands on something which is truly of a new dimension.

programme.title: SAAB
programme.desc: Saab, the iconic brand from Sweden, is a rolling manifesto of 'otherness'. A Saab is the perfect car for all non-conformists who have a sense of aesthetics, quality and comfort. They cars are considered to be individual and innovative. But in the end, Saab is insolvent as well. The fans remain though and keep the brand alive. Car History documents the rise and fall of this unique company.

programme.title: Extreme offroad cars
programme.desc: In this episode, we take a look at some of the more extreme specimens in the offroad world: a Fiat Panda monster truck whose tires have a diameter of 1.5 meters, a Ford Raptor with 600 hp, a conversion of a Mercedes G-class Edition by ORC, a modified Volkswagen Touareg R-Line by JE Design, an Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8, the brand's flagship, and the Fiat Panda Cross.

programme.title: Fascination offroad
programme.desc: At the All-Wheel Adventure in Bad Kissingen, Germany, the biggest exhibition for offroaders in Europe, we test drove the Rallye Defender and examined how a regular Jeep Wrangler with only a few modifications could double in price. Also: how does the small Fiat Panda 4x4 fare in the Icelandic highlands. Also: Land Rover's Bowler Defender and Volvo's 6-wheeler, the Laplander.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: The Dakar is the world's most brutal and demanding rally. There is just a thin line between succeeding and total failure. All top drivers take part in this event with sponsorships from big corporations or multinational company groups. All of them? No! Ali Gharib, a former member of the German Special Forces, wants to found the participation of his team at the 2015 Dakar on his own.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Rally driver Ali Gharib and his crew from Germany plan to take part at the Dakar 2015 as a private team. In nine months their Land Rover Defender and the rally crew must be ready to compete over a distance of 9.000 kilometers. As preparations move along, little by little the team realizes how big and complex this project really is.

programme.title: Highclass
programme.desc: The Bentley New Flying Spur and the Rolls Royce Wraith are both an extremely exclusive breed of cars. With more than 600 hp these luxurious power packs make for an almost transcendental driving experience and deliver the perfect combination of elegance and performance, for those who can afford such extravagant luxury.

programme.title: Luxury raised four
programme.desc: Porsche presented their Panamera 4 S with a 6-cylinder twin turbo instead of a V8 naturally aspirated engine which offered lower displacement, more power and lower fuel consumption. In addition: Jaguar reinvented itself with the XJ, offering modern technology in a fashionable dress. And: already a classic, the first all-electric luxury sedan that redefined electric mobility, Tesla's Model S.

programme.title: International SUVs
programme.desc: Luxury, lifestyle and exclusivity, no other cars transport these attributes better than the SUVs by Jaguar, Range Rover, Bentley, Volvo and Infinity. Whether it is cool British elegance, modern reduced Swedish design or a sporty Japanese look, these stylish and excellently equipped SUVs embody a spirit of adventure and a zest for life. DreamCars presents the most expensive and exclusive SUVs of the world like the Bentley Bentayga, the Volvo XC90 or the Infinity QX70.

programme.title: Myths and apparitions
programme.desc: Alfa Romeo and Rolls Royce, two brands that don't seem to share to many common features, but for car enthusiasts both names have an almost mythical feel to them. We took a look at the Italian sports car manufacturer's 4C model and the British luxury brand's Ghost. What divides them, and what do they have in common?

programme.title: Episode 03
programme.desc: People from the Middle East are crazy about their cars. On Put Your Car on TV they have the chance to present their tuned vehicles and judged. They are awarded points based on speed, style and sound and the car owner with the most points, wins a special treat for two from the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. Among the competitors are a Nova SS, a special Honda Acord and a car full of crystals.

programme.title: Episode 07
programme.desc: Once more, Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi are on the hunst for the most amazing cars in the world and ask car owners to bring their customized vehicles to Dubai, where it will be awarded points based on speed, style and sound. The car with the points wins a stay at the Sofitel Hotel Dubai Jumeirah Beach for two people. Among the presented cars are a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: Episode 08
programme.desc: On Put Your Car on TV people from the Middle East present their tuned vehicles. They are rewarded with points based on its styling, the highest (possible) speed ever driven und naturally also its sound. Whoever receives the most points, wins a luxurious treat from the Sofitel Hotel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. This time, a Lexus GSF, a Ford Mustang and a McLaren MP4-12C are put on the spotlight.

programme.title: A tuned Beetle!
programme.desc: It looks like a Volkswagen Beetle from the Seventies. But with contemporary tuning, 90 horse power and 112 mph top speed, it promises unlimited driving pleasure.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Ali Gharib's dream of competing with his private team at the 2015 Dakar continues. Finally, an outfitter can be found for the construction of a security cage for his rally car. Meanwhile Ali and his co-driver Hans-Christian Maurer conduct first driving lessons in a stone quarry. They have to get used to roadbook riding. This is the first crucial test for the team.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Private driver Ali Gharib from Germany wants to take part at the 2015 Dakar. He has to undergo high altitude training and a tough physical program. As the first fire suits are ready for Ali and his co-driver Hans-Christian, the team takes part in the 24-hours rally of Gorm. The event is a serious test for the Dakar newbies.

programme.title: All-Wheel-Drive on station wagons
programme.desc: Station wagons are usually regarded as family cars or just vehicles with a lot of cargo hold. But the Skoda Octavia, the Opel Insignia Country Tourer, the Subaru Outback, the Audi S4 allroad quattro and the Seat Leon x-perience want to be more than this. Their offroad look lures out the inner adventurer and their 4x4 drive provides the right traction in rough terrain. It doesn't always have to be an SUV.

programme.title: Small, strong, stylish
programme.desc: At first glance, compact cars like the Audi A1, the Volkswagen Golf and the Mini don't seem to belong in this series, but when the "A1" becomes the "S1" and the Golf gets a "R" in its name, these small cars turn into all-wheel beasts. Also: the Mini Countryman gets a rejuvenation. And: a test drive with the best-selling Volvo XC60.

programme.title: Part 04 - Grand Prix of Belgium
programme.desc: Highlights from the fourth round in Comblain au Pont, Belgium The FIM Trial World Championship is the world's most prestigious motorcycle trials championship. Its 2019 season consists of seven rounds with Toni Bou returning as the defending champion.

programme.title: Part 05 - Grand Prix of Portugal
programme.desc: Highlights from the fifth round in Comblain au Pont, Belgium The FIM Trial World Championship is the world's most prestigious motorcycle trials championship. Its 2019 season consists of seven rounds with Toni Bou returning as the defending champion.

programme.title: Episode 08
programme.desc: Bike World: The magazine for all fans of the lifestyle on two wheels on MOTORVISION TV. Whether on the road, off-road or on the race track: Bike World brings the latest trends from the world of motorcycles into living rooms around the world. Watch the latest tests of new two-wheelers, exciting reports from the hottest events and thrilling insights into superbike racing.

programme.title: BMW Motorcycle History
programme.desc: From traditionalist to trendsetter: BMW's long journey since 1923. Now the people from Munich are targeting completely new user groups.

programme.title: Harley-Davidson Cross Bones
programme.desc: The Harley-Davidson Softail Cross Bones is a cruiser style motorcycle who draws its power from a 4-Stroke, 1584cc, Air cooled, OHV - Pushrod, V Twin engine with Electric starter. The engine is paired with a 6-Speed transmission and total fuel capacity is 5 gallons.

programme.title: Herock Spa Rally
programme.desc: Highlights from the Spa Rally, which acts as the second round of the 2019 BRC season. The Belgian Rally Championship is one of the most competitive national rally championships in Europe and open to professionals and newcomers. Nine Belgian rallies are part of the 2019 schedule.

programme.title: Episode 9
programme.desc: From a vague idea to the actual participation at the Dakar Rally: After nine months of preparation, Ali Gharib and his team finally arrive in Bueno Aires. The amateur Land Rover Defender was transformed into a FIA legal race car and both pilots are ready for action. While Ali prepares himself for the rally, the tech team adapts the climate control system to local high temperatures.

programme.title: Rally Legends at the Red Bull Ring
programme.desc: Numerous racing battles were already fought here on two and on four wheels. Formula cars, touring cars and GTs usually abound on the twisty asphalt ribbon. - But today, there are some unusual guests: rally cars from the seventies and eighties. From the most glorious and wildest times of rallying: The „souped to the extreme“ Group B cars!

programme.title: TAC Rally
programme.desc: Highlights from the Tac Rally in Tielt, which acts as the third round of the 2019 BRC season. The Belgian Rally Championship is one of the most competitive national rally championships in Europe and open to professionals and newcomers. Nine Belgian rallies are part of the 2019 schedule.

programme.title: Rallye Paris Dakar - Classic Clip
programme.desc: After Mitsubishi cars have won the Paris-Dakar rally for seven years in a row. Volkswagen, wants to attack in 2009 with new designed equipment

programme.title: Rally Defender tuned by Bowler
programme.desc: Land Rover finally ends the production of the iconic Defender in 2015. But before that, the English demonstrate what the grand-daddy of off-road vehicles is capable of. The British rally-experts from Bowler have leant a hand: They have tuned the 2.2 liter diesel engine from 122 to 172 horse power. Maximum torque: 450NM (333 ft-lb). The result is a machine you can have a lot of fun with, as you can see.

programme.title: World Bodensee
programme.desc: The Tuning World Bodensee, the famous international exhibition for tuning with a lot of show and shine and action

programme.title: Tuner Grand Prix
programme.desc: Tuner Grand Prix - see the most famous tuning companies race against each other at the Hockenheimring. And watch Europs best drifters on the track.

programme.title: Episode 05
programme.desc: Put Your Car on TV gives every car owner the chance to bring their tuned machines to the Sofitel Hotel Dubai Jumeirah beach. There, Saif Hattawi will assess each car based on speed, style and sound. The person with the most amazing car wins a one night stay at the Sofitel Hotel Dubai Jumeirah Beach for two people. A BMW X6M, a massive Ford F250 and a special Nissan Patrol try to win this prize.

programme.title: Episode 06
programme.desc: The Walk' at JBR, the most prestigious location in Dubai, sets the background for the fastest customized cars in the Middle East. Put Your Car on TV invites car owners to present their cars and have it judged. The owner of the fastest, most beautiful and best sounding car wins a special treat from Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. Among the competitors are a Lamborghini Aventador and a GMC Chevrolet.

programme.title: Classic Space Cars
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Samba bus was able to accommodate 9 people and had room for plenty of luggage. The models with sunroof now ranks among the most sought-after VW microbus models and scores top sales prices at classic car auctions. Also: in Carinthia, Austria, a 1962 Graf & Stift postbus now drives tourists to their destination. And: it's small, it's cute, but also quite functional - the BMW Isetta.

programme.title: VW Golf
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Golf is a reasonable car. it’s not really exiting, but a bestseller! With more than 30 million units sold, the Golf is one of the most successful cars in automotive history. The models of the first generation have been cult objects for years, especially the Golf GTI and the Golf Cabriolet. Car History tells the story of the Volkswagen Golf and reveals its secret to success.

programme.title: Hans-Joachim Stuck
programme.desc: Hans-Joachim Stuck is one of the best racing drivers in Germany. Over his long career he not only won the Formula II and several international touring car championships multiple times but also the famous 24-hour race of Le Mans twice, the first time when he was only 19 years old. He truly is an icon of German and international motorsports when it comes to car racing.

programme.title: Tour Car Price Argentina
programme.desc: Tropical temperatures, never-ending dust and curves - some of the many difficulties for man and machine during the 1964 grand prix in Argentina. This race was responsible for taking the Mercedes brand to the top.

programme.title: Jaguar RS
programme.desc: After a rather turbulent history in the past couple of decades, Jaguar succeeded in finding new confidence and challenging their competitors with models like the XF-RS, XK-RS and F-Type. We took a look at the iconic British brand's latest developments.

programme.title: Jaguar F-Type
programme.desc: Jaguar found their way back to the world of sports cars. The F-Type doesn't just look good, it's got what it takes, and the car is able to take on the competition like the BMW Z4. We also took a closer look at two other competitors, the Porsche Boxster S and Nissan's 370 Z.

programme.title: Powerful Estates
programme.desc: If you're a passionate sports car fan and a family person at the same time, don't worry, as there are ways to combine both of these passions. The E 63 S AMG T with its V8 biturbo engine is as fast as a sportscar can be and takes you and your family wherever you want. In addition: the Audi RS6. And: the G-Power Hurrican with 750 hp.

programme.title: The beauty is a beast
programme.desc: We took the Mercedes AMG SLS GT to an airfield and the Porsche 911 Turbo S to the racetrack in order to see these sporty driving machines in action and test their performance. In addition: the Audi R8 4.0 TFSI's innovative lighting technology.

programme.title: Part 02 - Grand Prix of Japan
programme.desc: Highlights from the second round in Motegi, Japan The FIM Trial World Championship is the world's most prestigious motorcycle trials championship. Its 2019 season consists of seven rounds with Toni Bou returning as the defending champion.

programme.title: Part 03 - Grand Prix of The Netherlands
programme.desc: Highlights from the third round in Zelhem, The Netherlands The FIM Trial World Championship is the world's most prestigious motorcycle trials championship. Its 2019 season consists of seven rounds with Toni Bou returning as the defending champion.

programme.title: El Torro Run 2011, Part 1
programme.desc: For the third time in a row, the team from SKS Travel in collaboration with Robinson Club has put together a varied and eventful program here in southern Spain. Around 180 bikers have booked this trip and SKS has brought 150 Bikes to Spain in 5 trucks. Like with the Mallorca Bike Week - here there is also an all-inclusive package - that is, apart from the flight, everything is included in the price.

programme.title: Scotland on two Wheels
programme.desc: With the sometimes harsh climate and up to 300 rain days a year - Scotland is not primarily a biker's paradise. But with a little luck, the two-wheeled trip will be worthwhile after all.

programme.title: Part 02
programme.desc: Fast tracks and the magnificent langscape of the African plains, which includes many salt lakes and dunes: The Morocco Desert Challenge is back for its 11th season. Participants can look forward to some exciting updates, because the 3000-kilometer route has been totally renewed and now includes 2.5 stages in the Moroccan Sahara.

programme.title: Part 03
programme.desc: Fast tracks and the magnificent langscape of the African plains, which includes many salt lakes and dunes: The Morocco Desert Challenge is back for its 11th season. Participants can look forward to some exciting updates, because the 3000-kilometer route has been totally renewed and now includes 2.5 stages in the Moroccan Sahara.

programme.title: Episode 7
programme.desc: After the Baja Poland, Dakar privateer Ali Gharib and his team travel to Tunesia for desert testing. The Dakar rally team from Germany wants to gain some serious experience with the Land Rover Defender under real competition and climate conditions. Dampeners and drivetrain of the car get the last optimizations. Ali and HC learn how to drive over real desert dunes.

programme.title: Episode 8
programme.desc: The Dream Dakar is really about to happen. Finally the race car is equipped with a new FIA legal roll cage and an air-conditioning system is installed as well. Underbody and axles are also optimized once more. The service car is ready to roll and the hardware of the German team is shipped to Buenos Aires. The team members draw up their summary so far.

programme.title: Audi Quattro
programme.desc: The Audi quattro changed the car world forever. For the first time, a four-wheel-drive is not only deployed in a production car, but also in a rally car. Car History shows the evolution of the Audi quattro from its beginnings as a sports coupe to the S1 and S2, the most spectacular rally cars ever built. Rally world champion Walter Rohrl also shares his experiences with the quattro.

programme.title: Alfa Romeo - The quest for the original Giulietta
programme.desc: Nowadays, the mother of all Alfa Romeo Giuliettas is a sought-after but very rare specimen among collectors. We accompany the Alfa expert and collector Hartmut Stoppel with his new Giulietta in search of the original oldtimer in the Italian region of Piedmont.

programme.title: Fascination Nurburgring
programme.desc: The Historic Trophy at the Nurburgring race track featured classic cars from past eras of motorsports. Also: with the M3, BMW brought race car technology to the streets. It was a versatile car, suitable for the city, the country and the highway. And it left an impressive mark at the DTM as well. And: in 1987, the Ford Sierra RS Cosworth taught its racing competition the meaning of fear.

programme.title: Land Rover
programme.desc: The Land Rover is the bedrock of all terrain vehicles. Built in 1948 as a simple car for British farmers, the Land Rover soon became an export hit. Two years later the all-rounder was sold in over 70 countries. Today the Landy is at home all over the world. Car History highlights the story of Land Rover, which evolved into a luxury manufacturer with the introduction of the Range Rover.

programme.title: Audi Quattro - The Rally Classic
programme.desc: Advantage through Technology on rally tracks. The Audi Quattro shocks opponents.

programme.title: SUV Concepts
programme.desc: Before Bentley and Jaguar started producing their own luxury SUV models, the two British brands presented their take on this special range of cars. We took a look at their concept cars, the Bentley EXP 9F and Jaguar's C-X17. Also: how did Japanese manufacturers like Toyota, Nissan or Subaru see the future of the SUV? And: Mercedes-Benz' Unimog concept car.

programme.title: Ken Block in the Rally Cross World Cup
programme.desc: Ken Block is an all-rounder talent! In the Rally Cross World Cup he competes against the best rally drivers in the world.

programme.title: Trendy City - SUVs
programme.desc: City-SUVs are the latest trend in the automotive world. They aren't necessarily made for offroad terrain but attract customers through their modern and urban design. In this episode, the Subaru XV shows its offroad skills, and the Nissan Juke is taken to the race track in Dubai. And: the crown princes of compact SUVs, the Mercedes-AMG and the Audi RS Q3 GLA face each other in the mountains.

programme.title: Part 01
programme.desc: Fast tracks and the magnificent langscape of the African plains, which includes many salt lakes and dunes: The Morocco Desert Challenge is back for its 11th season. Participants can look forward to some exciting updates, because the 3000-kilometer route has been totally renewed and now includes 2.5 stages in the Moroccan Sahara.

programme.title: British Supercars
programme.desc: Whether it is the Aston Martin Vanquish, the Bentley Continental GT Speed, or McLaren's P1, British supercars are among the fastest, most spectacular and most beautiful sports cars in the world. It's just not about power but also a certain grace and style thanks to their smooth, aerodynamically shaped bodies. DreamCars presents the most fascinating British supercars.

programme.title: Lamborghini Huracan - Supercharged by O.CT
programme.desc: A lot of power thanks to a compressor. This optimized O.CT Lamborghini Huracan delivers over 800 horse power to get the blood flowing.

programme.title: Ferrari 458 Speciale
programme.desc: The Ferrari 458 Speciale is the most potent version of the 458 series. Its V8 engine produces 605 horse power at 9.000 RPM and makes it one of the most emotional vehicles on our roads. An awesome car with an blood-curdling sound.

programme.title: Aston Martin Vanquish V12 and Rapide
programme.desc: Every Aston Martin is hand made to a large extent. It takes a minimum of 600 hours work to produce new Aston Martins in a hall, as white as snow - more like a laboratory than a workshop. We take a closer look at the Aston Martin Vanquish V12 and the Rapide.

programme.title: Awesome Jaguar F-Type R Tuning: Arden AJ23
programme.desc: A Jaguar that is able to terrify the world alone with its roar. This Jaguar F-Type R tuned by Arden is a real bad boy. Already in the series production configuration, the F-Type R Coupe is a dream car that can really bite but this Jaguar which has been upgraded from Arden, now calls itself "AJ23“ and is more powerful, louder and more aggressive than any of his brothers.

programme.title: German Supercars
programme.desc: Whether it is the Porsche 918 Spyder, the Audi R8, the Mercedes AMG GT or the BMW i8 – these are the fastest, most spectacular and most coveted supercars in the world, with their breathtaking top speeds and incredible engine power. German supercars aren't only at the top of the list because of their unique performance, but they also set standards when it comes to design and innovative technology. DreamCars presents the most exciting and fastest German supercars.

programme.title: Essen Motor Show
programme.desc: The Motorshow in Essen, one of the leading exhibitions for tuning and motorsports. We are looking for the most powerful car at the fair.

programme.title: Episode 03
programme.desc: People from the Middle East are crazy about their cars. On Put Your Car on TV they have the chance to present their tuned vehicles and judged. They are awarded points based on speed, style and sound and the car owner with the most points, wins a special treat for two from the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. Among the competitors are a Nova SS, a special Honda Acord and a car full of crystals.

programme.title: Episode 04
programme.desc: The search for the fastest, best looking and best sounding car continues. Once more car lovers from the Middle East bring their tuned vehicles to the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach and have it judged by Saif Hattawi. The winner receives a special treat for two people from the luxurious Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. A Ford Mustang and a limited edition Chevrolet Corvette try to win the competition.

programme.title: John Cooper Works
programme.desc: The manufacturer Akrapovic has started with exhaust systems for motorcycles. Now the company is hitting the car market.

programme.title: American SUVs
programme.desc: In the United States, SUVs aren't usually considered simple workhorses but rather treated as regular everyday vehicles. US-Americans don't want to miss out on space, comfort and loading capacity. Their motto is: the bigger, the better. Chevrolet Suburban, Jeep Cherokee, GMC Yukon, we show you the world of US offroaders.

programme.title: Rallye Fun
programme.desc: Countryside tours aren't the only option with an all-wheel drive car. You can also have a lot of fun on gravel roads. We show how that goes in a Subaru WRX STI. Also: in the 1990s, Ford had a successful go at international rally competitions with the Ford Escort RS Cosworth. And: the Volkswagen Polo WRC shows its 4x4 skills at the World Rally Championship.

programme.title: Riding with Ken Block in the Ford F-150 RaptorTRAX
programme.desc: He’s slayed rubber across continents on board some of the fiercest machinery you’ll care to see, but for his latest creation: Ken Block takes to the hills to manhandle a 6.2L Supercharged Ford Raptor equipped with snow TRAX.

programme.title: Extreme offroad cars
programme.desc: In this episode, we take a look at some of the more extreme specimens in the offroad world: a Fiat Panda monster truck whose tires have a diameter of 1.5 meters, a Ford Raptor with 600 hp, a conversion of a Mercedes G-class Edition by ORC, a modified Volkswagen Touareg R-Line by JE Design, an Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8, the brand's flagship, and the Fiat Panda Cross.

programme.title: Mercedes Unimog
programme.desc: It is the standard against which usability in really difficult terrain has to be measured. For decades, the Unimog has been a reliable all-rounder.

programme.title: Episode 01
programme.desc: Bike World: The magazine for all fans of the lifestyle on two wheels on MOTORVISION TV. Whether on the road, off-road or on the race track: Bike World brings the latest trends from the world of motorcycles into living rooms around the world. Watch the latest tests of new two-wheelers, exciting reports from the hottest events and thrilling insights into superbike racing.

programme.title: BMW HP4 Race - limited racing bike
programme.desc: An incredible 158 kilowatts with only 149 pounds of ballast: The BMW HP4 RACE is a true racing bike. Strictly limited and highly sought after.

programme.title: Episode 02
programme.desc: Bike World: The magazine for all fans of the lifestyle on two wheels on MOTORVISION TV. Whether on the road, off-road or on the race track: Bike World brings the latest trends from the world of motorcycles into living rooms around the world. Watch the latest tests of new two-wheelers, exciting reports from the hottest events and thrilling insights into superbike racing.

programme.title: Harley bike tour through the desert of Dubai
programme.desc: There isn't just heat and drought in the UAE. This country is a true paradise for bikers. We took our new touring motorcycles by Harley-Davidson on a two-day trip from Dubai to Oman.

programme.title: Episode 03
programme.desc: Bike World: The magazine for all fans of the lifestyle on two wheels on MOTORVISION TV. Whether on the road, off-road or on the race track: Bike World brings the latest trends from the world of motorcycles into living rooms around the world. Watch the latest tests of new two-wheelers, exciting reports from the hottest events and thrilling insights into superbike racing.

programme.title: Rally van Haspengouw
programme.desc: Highlights from the Rally Van Haspengouw in Landen, which acts as the first round of the 2019 BRC season. The Belgian Rally Championship is one of the most competitive national rally championships in Europe and open to professionals and newcomers. Nine Belgian rallies are part of the 2019 schedule.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: The team of Dakar privateer Ali Gharib wants to participate in the Baja Poland to get some serious practice for the 2015 Dakar. But the Land Rover Defender of the German newbie team fails to get an approval for the built in security cage. The team is frustrated. The permission to start is refused at first, but Ali didn t come to Poland to dismiss his plans.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Dakar privateer Ali Gharib and his team of German volunteers finally made it through the technical inspection process of the Baja Poland rally and are allowed to start. The newbie-team is very excited. Even pro-drivers like Stephane Peterhansel use the opportunity to compete in this European rally as a final preparation for the annual Dakar.

programme.title: Mercedes Motorsport - Rally
programme.desc: Wether it is the Rallye Monte Carlo, the European Rallye Championship or the Street Grand Prix of Argentina, there was a time when Mercedes did dominate the international rallye scene with cars like the sluggish 180D or the heavy touring saloons 220 or 300SE. Hardly anybody knows that, after retirering from Formula 1 and Le Mans, starting at the end of the fifties Mercedes is using the Rallyesport for a long time as a testing ground since the use of production-close cars is mandatory then.

programme.title: Mercedes 280 SE meets America - Florida
programme.desc: Everybody knows the Italian car brands Ferrari, Maserati, Lamborghini and Alfa Romeo, but what about Iso Rivolta? Even though the brand disappeared, the legend lives on amongst car enthusiasts. Tillmann Miritz finds old Rivoltas with Corvette V8 engines on his road trip to the Sarasota Classic Car Museum in Florida. There Renzo Rivolta’s nephews build new cars, too, but this time for water.

programme.title: Kymco People GT 300i - Review & Test Drive
programme.desc: 10 or 16 inch wheels - is this really just a question of taste? MOTORVISION TV reveals the advantages and disadvantages of the big wheel motorcycle People GT 300i, made by Kymco.

programme.title: Mercedes 280 SE meets America - Florida 2
programme.desc: Which is the most American car of the 60s? Which is the symbol for the American art of car manufacturing? For many people it’s either the Corvette or the Ford Mustang. During his search for these American dream cars of the 60s Tillmann Miritz makes a surprise discovery in Florida. Revology Cars are upgrading original 1964 Ford Mustang chassis with modern technology and engines.

programme.title: Prince Leopold von Bayern
programme.desc: Coming from a famous noble family, Prince Leopold of Bavaria started a career as a rally driver in the 1960s before switching to touring cars. He successfully took part in several international races like the 24 Hours of Le Mans or the James Hardy 1000 for the Porsche and BMW brands, and he still remains involved with the BMW racing team as an adviser after ending his career in 1998.

programme.title: Chris Pfeiffer reviews the BMW F 800 R
programme.desc: BMW F 800 R is a robust roadster with a lot of spirit, and even motorcycle world champions count on its agility. World champion, Chris Pfeiffer is showing just how much fun you can have with a BMW F 800 R. His work motorcycle is based on the version that you can buy.

programme.title: Action Concept
programme.desc: Bus Stunt - Ein Mega Stunt mit einem Straßenlinienbus. Mit 90 Stundenkilometern raste der auf eine Rampe zu, flog a la 'Speed' gute 20 Meter durch die Luft, krachte mit berstenden Scheiben zu Boden, um dann am Ende in eine Boschung zu rasen!

programme.title: Salto Mortale
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes from Action Concept face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman behind the wheel of an estate wagon. It’s a new task for coordinator and adrenaline junkie Christoph “Domi” Domanski. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fight choreography in some spectacular driving scenes. Adrenaline-pumped stunts with lots of crashes are guaranteed!

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: Ferrari - the name alone gets your heart racing. Wherever the iconic fire red legend from Maranello is, the car with the jumping horse on its emblem is always at the center of attention. Car History recounts the story of Ferrari, from the very first sports car up to the Ferrari FF, and shows historical footage from the Formula One and interviews with seven times world champion Michael Schumacher.

programme.title: Conversivel para quatro lugares
programme.desc: In the 1950s, BMW introduced the 503, a four-seater V8 that was available as a coupe or convertible version. Although this model was a financial loss, it really is a beautiful classic car, highly sought after by collectors. Also: the famous car from TV detective Columbo, the Peugeot 403 convertible. And: after World War II, Mercedes-Benz returned to the luxury class with its 170 S cabriolet.

programme.title: Arabella Classics
programme.desc: Rare Automobiles and stunning views! The Arabella Classics, one of the most exclusive Classic Car Rallies in Europe.

programme.title: Audi Quattro
programme.desc: The Audi quattro changed the car world forever. For the first time, a four-wheel-drive is not only deployed in a production car, but also in a rally car. Car History shows the evolution of the Audi quattro from its beginnings as a sports coupe to the S1 and S2, the most spectacular rally cars ever built. Rally world champion Walter Rohrl also shares his experiences with the quattro.

programme.title: Highclass
programme.desc: The Bentley New Flying Spur and the Rolls Royce Wraith are both an extremely exclusive breed of cars. With more than 600 hp these luxurious power packs make for an almost transcendental driving experience and deliver the perfect combination of elegance and performance, for those who can afford such extravagant luxury.

programme.title: Lifestyle SUVs
programme.desc: The desert, an endless horizon, green highlands and rugged hills. In Morocco, you can find the dream landscapes from 1001 nights. We took the Porsche Macan Turbo on a trip through the fascinating city of Marrakesh and the beautiful countryside. In addition: the BMW X 6M, one of the pioneers in the very trendy SUV coupe segment.

programme.title: Cops in the Fast Lane
programme.desc: In a city that loves to show off wealth and luxury, the Dubai police are eager to represent this image via its fleet of patrol cars that includes a Chevrolet Camaro, a Lamborghini Aventador, a Bentley GT, a Ferrari FF, an Aston Martin and a Mercedes SLS. For the first time ever, the Dubai Police Special Cars Unit allowed a television crew to accompany them on their service missions.

programme.title: V8 Open
programme.desc: What better way is there to celebrate a stylish and powerful car and a sunny summer day than going for a cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC? In addition: a Brit with a fiery temperament, the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp. And: Mercedes AMG's SL models, uncompromising performance.

programme.title: Car Tales from High Desert in California
programme.desc: On his journey to Las Vegas Marco drops by Big Mike in the Apple Valley, a remote area in the High Desert of California. Together they meet Big Mike’s bizarre friends from the Lowdown Kustos family, which once have been trendsetters of the Californian car customizing scene. Afterwards he gets involved with Big Mike’s scary Bike Buddies, when they ride through the dessert spreading fear and panic.

programme.title: Plenty of Luxury in the Cadillac CT6
programme.desc: Cadillac wants to occupy a permanent place in the segment of the upper-class sedans, which is dominated by German manufacturers. The CT6 can stand out from the other models especially with its design.

programme.title: SEMA, Las Vegas - Part 1
programme.desc: Every year 150,000 petrol heads travel to the Nevada desert to attend the SEMA in Las Vegas, the biggest and best-known tuning exhibition in the world. Among them is motoring journalist Kati. She meets with tuning expert Dirk Hattenhauer, looks for the latest crazy trends and meets some celebrities from the tuning szene like customizer John D’Agostino and drifting king Ken Block.

programme.title: SEMA, Las Vegas - Part 2
programme.desc: The SEMA Show in Las Vegas is the biggest and best-known tuning exhibition in the world. From complexly rebuilt show cars to giant off-road monster trucks: anything is represented here. But these cars don’t just stand around. Virtually anyone from the scene presents themselves during the legendary cruise. And at the after-show party “SEMA Ignited”, they make the asphalt melt.

programme.title: Chris Pfeiffer reviews the BMW F 800 R
programme.desc: BMW F 800 R is a robust roadster with a lot of spirit, and even motorcycle world champions count on its agility. World champion, Chris Pfeiffer is showing just how much fun you can have with a BMW F 800 R. His work motorcycle is based on the version that you can buy.

programme.title: Breathtaking Stunts
programme.desc: Breathtaking stunts of professional drivers and slapsticks of high-powered sheet metal bullets.

programme.title: The Very First Time
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes from Action Concept are shooting a car rollover. But stunt coordinator Carl wants to go all out. His motto is: if you’re going to do something at all, you might as well do it properly! Thus, he adds an exciting shootout to the mix. Also, he has a surprise for his boss. During the rollover he wants Uwe to sit in the passenger seat – for the very first time!

programme.title: Bentley Continental GTC Speed
programme.desc: In the Bentley GTC Speed - the top model of the 2006 Continental GT Cabriolet Series - a W12 Twin Turbo is at work, its torque: 800 Newton Meters. This engine also serves in the Audi A8 without a turbo. With Bentley the VW group has revived a myth which has an almost sacred character in the automotive industry. Today only the name remains, the technology has long since come from VW. But the perception has not suffered a bit.

programme.title: 50 years of Opel KAD
programme.desc: 1964 marked Opel's foray into the luxury class market and its attack on Mercedes-Benz when the brand presented its KAD series with the Kapitan, Admiral and Diplomat - a range of cars that offered US-American design paired with German technology. We took a look at several models from this era.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Volvo Classic Cars are always solid, always safe, but not always beautiful. Since 1927 the Swedish car company produces cars, which are a little bit different. But no matter if their individual models are curvy or boxy; a Volvo is always an individual car. Get ready for a ride through the history of Volvo on this episode of Car History.

programme.title: Indy 500
programme.desc: One of the world's most spectacular racing cars in the world: the Indy 500. Watched by a huge number of people it doesn't fail to impress at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

programme.title: 50 Years of Porsche 911
programme.desc: For 50 years the Porsche 911 has been the epitome of sports cars. No other model of Porsche has represented racing success and brand reliability on the road as well as the 911. Car History explains the secret of this fascinating vehicle, which forms the basis for all further generations of the model, and showcases the evolution from the original 1963 911 to the GT2 RS and the latest 911 (991).

programme.title: Wildly through the desert
programme.desc: In 2010, BMW and the German racing team X-Raid decided to transform a Mini Countryman into an offroad-vehicle and participate in the world-famous Dakar Rally. Also: the Mercedes G63 AMG 6x6, a most exclusive, over-the-top 6-wheel off-road monster shows its skills in the desert near Dubai. And: the Kia Sportage feels both at home in the rocky terrain of Sicily and the city.

programme.title: Ken Block at the Monza Rallye Show
programme.desc: In Monza, Ken Block is set to compete against Allstars from motorsport at the Monza Rally Show.

programme.title: Oman AdventureTour - VW Amarok
programme.desc: This year, the Amarok Adventure Tour will take you to Oman. During the journey we drive over the stony paths of the Hadjar Mountains as well as across the sandy desert. - How our VW Amarok Aventura 3.0 l V6 TDI 4MOTION masters the challenges and what else we experience our driving report from Oman shows in detail. Source: http://quickcarreview.com

programme.title: Part 02
programme.desc: Fast tracks and the magnificent langscape of the African plains, which includes many salt lakes and dunes: The Morocco Desert Challenge is back for its 11th season. Participants can look forward to some exciting updates, because the 3000-kilometer route has been totally renewed and now includes 2.5 stages in the Moroccan Sahara.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: SUVs usually are rather impressive right out of the factory, but there are many tuning and customizing options: huge wheels, crazy colors and perfomance similar to super sports cars. One might ask if such alterations are really necessary, but enthusiasts are excited. In this episode we present Kelleners BMW X5, the Mercedes Brabus B63 and the Porsche Cayenne tuned by Techart.

programme.title: Germany's Supercars Rallye
programme.desc: With more than 500 supercars from Lamborghini, Ferrari or expensive brands like Bugatti and Koenigsegg, Germany is home to the world's largest Supercars Rallye. Participants can look forward to action-packed stages like a quarter-mile drag race and 30 policecars. US car fans Kati and her husband Patrick take part in this event with a brand new Chevrolet Camaro. Cannonball race fun at its best!

programme.title: V8 Open
programme.desc: What better way is there to celebrate a stylish and powerful car and a sunny summer day than going for a cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC? In addition: a Brit with a fiery temperament, the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp. And: Mercedes AMG's SL models, uncompromising performance.

programme.title: Blancpain Endurance Series 2013
programme.desc: 1,000 kilometers on the famous Nurburgring. It's the final race of the 2013 season. The Blancpain Endurance Series is a racing event for grand tourers like the Ferrari 458 Italia, the McLaren MP4-12 C or the Nissan GT-R Nismo GT3. We took a look at all the action, the drivers, their cars and the competition.

programme.title: Jaguar F-Type
programme.desc: Jaguar found their way back to the world of sports cars. The F-Type doesn't just look good, it's got what it takes, and the car is able to take on the competition like the BMW Z4. We also took a closer look at two other competitors, the Porsche Boxster S and Nissan's 370 Z.

programme.title: Episode 04
programme.desc: The search for the fastest, best looking and best sounding car continues. Once more car lovers from the Middle East bring their tuned vehicles to the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach and have it judged by Saif Hattawi. The winner receives a special treat for two people from the luxurious Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. A Ford Mustang and a limited edition Chevrolet Corvette try to win the competition.

programme.title: A tuned Beetle!
programme.desc: It looks like a Volkswagen Beetle from the Seventies. But with contemporary tuning, 90 horse power and 112 mph top speed, it promises unlimited driving pleasure.

programme.title: Episode 05
programme.desc: Put Your Car on TV gives every car owner the chance to bring their tuned machines to the Sofitel Hotel Dubai Jumeirah beach. There, Saif Hattawi will assess each car based on speed, style and sound. The person with the most amazing car wins a one night stay at the Sofitel Hotel Dubai Jumeirah Beach for two people. A BMW X6M, a massive Ford F250 and a special Nissan Patrol try to win this prize.

programme.title: BMW M3 Test Drive - The most successful BMW of all times!
programme.desc: In the late 80s BMW brought a car onto the market which carried true racing genes. Initially conceived as a homologation model for the German Touring Car Championship, it developed into being one of the world's hottest street sports car. Whenever its name is mentioned, car fans feel goosebumps - even today: the BMW M3.

programme.title: Episode 06
programme.desc: The Walk' at JBR, the most prestigious location in Dubai, sets the background for the fastest customized cars in the Middle East. Put Your Car on TV invites car owners to present their cars and have it judged. The owner of the fastest, most beautiful and best sounding car wins a special treat from Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. Among the competitors are a Lamborghini Aventador and a GMC Chevrolet.

programme.title: Porsche Ruf RT35
programme.desc: Ruf RT35 may look like a Porsche, but it really isn't. Since 1981, the Ruf company in Pfaffhausen, Germany, has been recognized as an independent manufacturer. But the basis for its vehicles comes exclusively from Porsche. A Ruf is even faster and more exclusive than a comparable Porsche.

programme.title: Fascination offroad
programme.desc: At the All-Wheel Adventure in Bad Kissingen, Germany, the biggest exhibition for offroaders in Europe, we test drove the Rallye Defender and examined how a regular Jeep Wrangler with only a few modifications could double in price. Also: how does the small Fiat Panda 4x4 fare in the Icelandic highlands. Also: Land Rover's Bowler Defender and Volvo's 6-wheeler, the Laplander.

programme.title: Audi Quattro - The Rally Classic
programme.desc: Advantage through Technology on rally tracks. The Audi Quattro shocks opponents.

programme.title: All-Wheel-Drive on snow
programme.desc: In winter, when the streets get slippery, an all-wheel drive vehicle brings many advantages as you gain more traction. Under icy conditions we experienced one day in snowy Austria with rally professional Niki Schelle in a Suzuki SX4 S-Cross. Also: why is the Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution perfect for drifting? And: Germany vs. America. Mercedes and Chrysler present their all-wheel concept cars.

programme.title: Part 03
programme.desc: Fast tracks and the magnificent langscape of the African plains, which includes many salt lakes and dunes: The Morocco Desert Challenge is back for its 11th season. Participants can look forward to some exciting updates, because the 3000-kilometer route has been totally renewed and now includes 2.5 stages in the Moroccan Sahara.

programme.title: Off-Road Adventure in Mexico
programme.desc: A motorcycle tour through Mexico. Attractive landscapes promise of a lot of driving fun. But the roads west of Mexico City are mostly unpaved - a real challenge for man and machine.

programme.title: European Boss Hoss Rally 2011, Part 1
programme.desc: No 'Boss Hoss' looks like the other. Each bike has been built and painted individually for its owner. The meteorites come unpainted to the dealer from the plant in Dyersbourg in the State of Tennessee, USA. The buyer can choose a solid color from the RAL color catalog. However, most opt for an airbrush finish with their own ideas, but for which the future owner must pay for.

programme.title: European Boss Hoss Rally 2011, Part 1
programme.desc: No 'Boss Hoss' looks like the other. Each bike has been built and painted individually for its owner. The meteorites come unpainted to the dealer from the plant in Dyersbourg in the State of Tennessee, USA. The buyer can choose a solid color from the RAL color catalog. However, most opt for an airbrush finish with their own ideas, but for which the future owner must pay for.

programme.title: Episode 08
programme.desc: Bike World: The magazine for all fans of the lifestyle on two wheels on MOTORVISION TV. Whether on the road, off-road or on the race track: Bike World brings the latest trends from the world of motorcycles into living rooms around the world. Watch the latest tests of new two-wheelers, exciting reports from the hottest events and thrilling insights into superbike racing.

programme.title: Glemseck 101
programme.desc: Once a year, the European custom motorcycle scene meets in Leonberg, near Stuttgart. Fans of cafe racers, vintage motorcycles and nostalgia alike meet at Glemseck 101, Europe's largest event for motorcycle enthusiasts and bikers.

programme.title: Rallye Le Jog
programme.desc: Land's End in Cornwall and John O'Groats in Scotland form the starting point and the finish of the Rallye Le Jog, considered by many the toughest classic car rally in the world. We accompanied a German women's team on this challenge with their all-terrain Volkswagen Iltis. Also: the 1947 Triumph 1800 Roadster, a reminiscence to the times of "Miss Marple". And: the 1919 Wolseley Stellite.

programme.title: Rally Transsiberia
programme.desc: The Transsiberia Rally challenges its participants with 4400 miles of roads and offroad tracks throughout eastern Europe and Asia. It is one of the world's greatest offroad challenges!

programme.title: German Rally Championship 1983
programme.desc: The German rally championship is one of the most popular motorsport series which has been running since 1970. In its 1983 race the sport model from Opel saw exceptional success.

programme.title: Audi Annual Press Conference 2020
programme.desc: 2020 was dominated by a global pandemic and great upheaval, which therefore shifted the focus even more strongly to the question of responsible actions. As part of the automotive industry, we are responsible for our employees and customers, for stable economic growth, and for a sustainable business model. Despite – or precisely because of – the current challenges, we are in a position where we can make a big difference. At Audi, we see ambitious climate targets, the paradigm shift toward software, and the impetus created by new competitors as an opportunity to play an active part in shaping the future of mobility. Our Board of Management team, which has been active in a new constellation for about a year, will provide an overview on how Audi handled the unusual year of 2020 and on which future topics we have our sights firmly set.

programme.title: Electric Goes Hollywood
programme.desc: Often, changes in the US and in other parts of the world are spearheaded by famous actors, sports players, singers, and politicians. For many years now, high-profile individuals have been supporting the change from gas to electric vehicles. - How do many in Hollywood and beyond feel about electric cars? Dozens of famous people have been spotted in their EVs and Hybrids! Here are some famous celebrities in electric cars.

programme.desc: With electric vehicles on the rise, sound designers are getting a chance to create the auditory experience of the 21st-century.

programme.title: Audi TechTalk: Audi e-tron FE07
programme.desc: From zero to one hundred in 2.8 seconds, more than 95 percent efficiency within the entire car and preparation for any contingency in every detail, this describes the Audi e-tron FE07 that has been developed by Audi Sport, including its new Audi MGU05 motor-generator unit.

programme.title: Animation Domination: e-tron Technology Explained
programme.desc: Audi utilizes well-executed and easy-to-understand animations to explain the amazing technology behind the all-electric e-tron.

programme.title: Audi e-tron Making of – Documentary on the Electric SUV’s Development and Production
programme.desc: Take a look behind the scenes of the Audi e-tron: this documentary follows the #development and #testing of the #electric #car. Its engineers and concepters talk about their work.

programme.title: Audi e-tron Making of – Documentary on the Electric SUV’s Development and Production
programme.desc: Take a look behind the scenes of the Audi e-tron: this documentary follows the #development and #testing of the #electric #car. Its engineers and concepters talk about their work.

programme.title: Electrified - The Current State of Electric Vehicles
programme.desc: Chelsea Sexton, Paul Scott, Forth Mobility, and several owners come together to discuss how electric cars have evolved and where we currently are in the state of this developing technology. It covers issues and experiences related to charging, battery degradation, and range anxiety, along with detailed explanations of charging levels, types of electric vehicles, and the future of hydrogen. - This film prepares viewers with the knowledge needed for properly assessing vehicle options, along with considerations for charging, and knowledge about what they may need to know before making a purchase.

programme.title: Who Stole the Electric Car?
programme.desc: In the year 1995, a self-centered average guy steals a prototype electric car in a crazy attempt to win back his Africa-bound environmentalist girlfriend. During his road trip from the Motor City to Southern California, he teams up with a vegetarian sidekick and, pursued by the police, the duo race across the country. . . without using a single drop of gasoline. - Directors: James Dastoli, Robert Dastoli - Starring: Carl Fieler, Chris Shields

programme.title: UAE Warriors 6: Oli Thompson vs Tarek Suleiman
programme.desc: In the main event Thompson faces Tarek Suleiman in a bout that has the inaugural UAE Warriors light heavyweight title on the line. The Englishman is coming off a stoppage win at Abu Dhabi Warriors 5 earlier this year. The co-main event sees Ahmed Labban take on Amin Ayoub in a bout which will have the welterweight title on the line. Meanwhile Rolando Dy faces Erzhan Estanov for the UAE Warriors featherweight strap.

programme.title: UAE Warriors 9
programme.desc: UAE Warriors 9 brings to you live action from Mubadala Arena in Abu Dhabi on November 29th, 2019. The 15-fight card is headlined by a lightweight bout between UFC veterans Dan Moret and Anton Kuivanen. In the co-headliner, Steven Kennedy faces Tarek Suleiman. In the lightweight division, undefeated Russian Usman Nurmagomedov has been matched with Ukraine’s Roman Golovinov. Meanwhile in the middleweight division ONE Championship alumni Bakhtiyar Abbasov has been matched with Igor Litoshik and Ahmad Labban faces Magomedsultan Magomedsultanov.

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 1
programme.desc: They’re big. They’re bold. They’re fight stars. The best combat sport stars in the ring/cage, on the canvas and living it up outside of their sport, including UFC sharp shooting Conor Mcgregor and the judo french force, Teddy Riner. We also look at fighters who have made it in Hollywood while learning the skilful art of trash talking from some of the best. Finally it’s the brightest duo in WWE, the Bella Twins!

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 2
programme.desc: They’re big. They’re bold. They’re fight stars. The best combat sport stars in the ring, on the canvas and living it up outside of their sport, including Britain's boxer Anthony Joshua while UFC’s Ronda Rousey has met her match. We also look at fighters who have made some nice coin and a footballer turned wrestler. Finally it’s a new star in the UFC, Paige VanZant!

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 3
programme.desc: They’re bold. They’re fight stars. The best combat sport stars in the ring, cage and on the canvas, living it up outside of their sport, including the Filipino with a fighting spirit Manny Pacquiao and what the best in the UFC use to fuel their fights. We also look at the greatest, Muhammad Ali and the wrestler Helen Maroulis. Finally it’s the Hollywood superstar who hooked up with the wrestler!

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 4
programme.desc: We Speak to “Rowdy” Ronda Rousey, and her old training partner, Kayla Harrison. We also look at some boxers who won an Olympic medal - before becoming a champion and Mexico’s finest, Canelo Alvarez. Finally, Nikki Bella found love with fellow wrestler, John Cena!

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 5
programme.desc: China's biggest boxing star, Zou Shiming. In the UFC we step outside of the canvas to learn about colour commentator Joe - Rogan and some fighters who became politicians. Finally, it’s Kosovo’s first Olympic gold medallist and more of that trash talk!

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 6
programme.desc: She is an inspiration across the globe and the next generation, also has dominated women's boxing, it's Nicola Adams. Join her fascinating journey of becoming one of the best British female boxers!

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 7
programme.desc: They’re big. They’re bold. They’re fight stars. The best combat sport stars in the ring, on the canvas and living it up outside of their sport, including some females dominating the fight world like Angela Lee and Paige VanZant. In the UFC we look at Michael Bisping’s clean slate win. - Finally, we can’t forget about Hollywood and Demi Lovato's love life while Sylvester Stallone learns how to box from the best!

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 8
programme.desc: Wladimir Klitschko’s return to the ring and Hollywood’s Idris Elba entering the world of combat sports. In the UFC we look at Tito Ortiz and his love life. Finally, Irish boxer Katie Taylor and one of Hollywood’s biggest - stars, Jackie Chan!

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 9
programme.desc: The rise and fall of Tyson Fury and Nicola Adams exciting start to the year. In the UFC we find out about the first man to beat Conor McGregor, Nate Diaz. Finally, it’s the heavyweight hero turned salesman, George Foreman and - Jay Z’s boxers in the ring!

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 10
programme.desc: Floyd Mayweather Jr and his post boxing career and some anti trash talkers in the sport. In wrestling, we look at Japan’s big list of medallists at Rio 2016 and finally, it’s the boxer who went from fighting in the streets to the ring, - Robson Conceicao

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 11
programme.desc: The best combat sport stars in the cage and on the - canvas, living it up outside of their sport, including UFC veteran Anderson Silva, while 50 Cent tries to make it in the ring. Heavyweight boxer Anthony Joshua has a small surprise while there’s more women rising up the UFC ranks. And fight stars in films!

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 12
programme.desc: UFC’s Jon Jones, Jay Z and Oscar De La Hoya hedge their bets. Carl Froch gets into some trash talk and we find out about more females setting their sights high in the combat world, from Cuban boxers to the American - boxer turned MMA fighter, Holly Holm!

programme.title: Wing Chun for MMA Volume 1: Kicking Basics
programme.desc: Learn to use effective Wing Chun kicks in MMA! In this volume, Durch teaches the leg hook kick, groin hook kick, scoop kick, oblige kick, and a hook kick to the face. You will also learn three count training drills for each kick and focus pad training for combination kicks to increase accuracy and speed.

programme.title: Royce Gracie
programme.desc: Enjoy face to face conversations with martial arts legends & high level practitioners. This week we sit down with Royce Gracie.

programme.title: 4 Way Training System Workout (MMA)
programme.desc: Over 50 MMA Cross training exercises

programme.title: The Combat Show - Jeff Smith
programme.desc: Interview with martial artists.

programme.title: Wing Chun for MMA Vol 2 - Punching and Approaches
programme.desc: Continue learning Wing Chun techniques in MMA with punches and approaches. Durch covers the four corners of Wing Chun punching, boxing punches vs. Wing Chun punches, and the straight blast. He will teach you to train with pads as well as with a partner.

programme.title: Jessica Melon Rock Solid: Competitive Martial Arts Volume 1 - Competition Basics
programme.desc: Jessica teaches competition etiquette, including what to do before entering a competition, how to pick music for musical forms, how to correctly walk in and introduce yourself, and gives tips on what the judges will be watching for. Jessica will also teach you a few easy, yet creative hand and kicking combinations that can be used in your own form.

programme.title: Jessica Melon Rock Solid: Competitive Martial Arts Volume 2 - Advanced Competition
programme.desc: This next level focuses on advanced walk_ins, tips on how to make a form more fluid, yells, and more advice on what the judges will be looking for. Jessica also includes new advanced hand and kicking combinations, as well as dynamic form introductions.

programme.title: Raiders Of Buddhist Kung Fu
programme.desc: At the turn of the 19th century, ex-official Nan Kit conspires to challenge the government and restore the infamous Manchu Dynasty by mastering the Buddhist style of kung-fu.

programme.title: Death Machines
programme.desc: Mr. Soh returns to Japan after the war and protects the weak during a lawless time.

programme.title: Stickfighting Techniques Volume 2: Arnis Double Sticks
programme.desc: Watch Arnis as he introduces you to the history of the Filipino martial arts.

programme.title: Shaolin Vs Evil Dead 2: Ultimate Power
programme.desc: His fellow Taoist priest Hak has turned into a vampire and he must use all his power to stop Hak and his legion of vampires from bringing eternal darkness to the nation.

programme.title: Death Machines

programme.title: Ninja Death 3

programme.title: Fundamentals of Brazilian Jiu Jitsu: The Guard: Sweeps And Passing the Guard
programme.desc: From attack position to defense position watch as Allan shows you how to defend yourself

programme.title: Mission for the Dragon

programme.title: Mike Parker Muay Thai for MMA Volume 1: Boxing Basics
programme.desc: Learn to use the foundations of Muay Thai in MMA! In this volume, Sifu Parker teaches basic Muay Thai stance, footwork, movement, punches and combinations, defensive movement, and counter punching.

programme.title: Mike Parker Muay Thai for MMA Volume 2: Elbow Strikes
programme.desc: Learn the three keys to power_ regular elbow, upward elbow, and downward elbow strikes! Train with focus mitts and drills to build speed and power! Sifu Parker shows elbow drills such as the regular feed, the blitz, and the snap elbow drill. Finally, he will teach combinations with punches and elbows_ very effective in MMA.

programme.title: Glasgow
programme.desc: Host, Charlie David is on a quest to discover exactly what IS under those kilts in - our Glasgow episode. His tour stops include: a chat with the producer of - Glasgay (GlasgowÕs annual celebration of queer culture), lacing up his skates - with the Glaswegian Roller derby girls, trying out for the HotScots gay football - team, and dropping down a wee pint or two with the lads and lasses in Merchant - City, GlasgowÕs gay quarter. He also manages to try out a few kilt options for - himself.

programme.title: Honolulu
programme.desc: ItÕs time to hang loose in Honolulu for host, Shannon McDonough. Adjusting to - Island life involves a Hawaiian makeover at the luscious outdoor Ala Moana - shopping centre, Hula lessons at the Royal Hawaiian Center, surf lessons on the - beach and a cooking lesson with Chef Chai at his popular resto. She manages to - save up just enough energy to explore the piping hot nightlife of this tropical - paradise.

programme.title: Tel Aviv
programme.desc: This city is a dichotomy. While unarguably trendy, modern and vibrant, this - particular part of the world also possesses one of the most violent histories of - any place on earth. And itÕs located in the midst of the constant strife and discord - of todayÕs Middle East. So how is it that, in the birthplace of the 3 great, - monotheistic religions, this country is one of the most advanced gay-liberation - nations in the world, and this Ð her modern cultural capitol - one of the hottest - and most liberal gay cities? Find out, as Charlie David explores the many - adventures that await the LGBT tourist in Tel Aviv.
